Source Sentence: Maintaining peace, the stability of borders and the resolution of border disputes, progress towards democracy, the rule of law and the promotion of regional cooperation are essential for development in this region of the world.
Translation: A béke fenntartása, a határstabilitás és a határvita megoldása, a demokrácia felé vezető előrehaladás, a jogállamiság és a regionális együttműködés előmozdítása elengedhetetlenek a világ ezen régiójának fejlődéséhez.
Reference Sentence: A béke fenntartása, a határok stabilitása és a határ menti viták megoldása, valamint a demokrácia, a jogállamiság és a regionális együttműködés elősegítése érdekében tett előrelépés nélkülözhetetlen elemei a világ e része fejlődésének.

Source Sentence: When media people, newspaper publishers, come and tell us they have questions, we should discuss those questions seriously.
Translation: Amikor a média, az újságírók jönnek és megmondják nekünk, hogy vannak kérdések, komolyan meg kell vitatnunk ezeket a kérdéseket.
Reference Sentence: Amikor a médiában dolgozók és a hírlapkiadók odajönnek hozzánk és elmondják, hogy vannak kérdéseik, akkor ezeket a kérdéseket nagyon komolyan meg kell vitatnunk.

Source Sentence: The importance of this decision cannot be underestimated either by the Nordic countries or by the Member States around the Baltic Sea that joined in 2004.
Translation: E határozat jelentőségét nem lehet alábecsülni sem az északi országok, sem a 2004-ben csatlakozott Balti-tengeren élő tagállamok.
Reference Sentence: E döntés fontosságát aligha becsülik alá az északi országok, de a Balti-tenger mellett élő, 2004-ben csatlakozott tagállamok sem.

Source Sentence: That all sounds very fine, but the reality is harsher.
Translation: Minden jól hangzik, de a valóság keményebb.
Reference Sentence: Ez mind remekül hangzik, a valóság azonban kevésbé idilli.

Source Sentence: Parliament has a lot to accomplish in the Stockholm Programme, including in the area of organised crime, and not only within the European Union.
Translation: A Parlamentnek sokat kell elérnie a Stockholm programban, többek között a szervezett bűnözés terén, és nem csak az Európai Unióban.
Reference Sentence: A Parlamentnek sok elvégzendő feladata van a Stockholmi Programban, többek között a szervezett bűnözés terén, és nem csak az Európai Unión belül.

Source Sentence: I am not suggesting that is what the EU has done before.
Translation: Nem azt javaslom, amit az EU korábban tett.
Reference Sentence: Amivel nem azt akarom sugallni, mintha az EU korábban így járt volna el.

Source Sentence: As I reiterate my opposition, I would say that I think it would have been a good idea to wait for the decision of the Court of Justice of the European Union on 8 March before discussing the issue in this House.
Translation: Mivel ismételtem az ellenzékemet, azt gondolom, jó ötlet lenne várni az Európai Unió Bíróságának március 8-i határozatát, mielőtt megvitatná a kérdést ebben a házban.
Reference Sentence: Az ellenvéleményem megismétlése mellett el szeretném még mondani, hogy véleményem szerint a vita e Házban történő megvitatása előtt jó lett volna megvárni az Európai Unió Bírósága által március 8-án meghozandó határozatot.

Source Sentence: The strategy is based on Romania's branding as a country, which is a concept we are using to present to prospective tourists the authentic nature of our traditions and the wonderful landscapes we have.
Translation: A stratégia Románia mint ország márkáján alapul, amely egy olyan koncepciót használunk, amelyben bemutatjuk a potenciális turistáknak hagyományaink és csodálatos tájak valódi természetét.
Reference Sentence: Ez a stratégia Románia jellegzetességeire és arra a koncepcióra épül, hogy bemutassuk valódi hagyományainkat és az országunkban található gyönyörű tájakat a potenciális turisták számára.

Source Sentence: I voted in favour of the oral question on trade relations between the EU and Japan, given that Japan is one of the main investors in the European Union.
Translation: Az EU és Japán közötti kereskedelmi kapcsolatokról szóló szóban forgó kérdés mellett szavaztam, mivel Japán az Európai Unió egyik fő befektetője.
Reference Sentence: Igennel szavaztam az EU és Japán közötti kereskedelmi kapcsolatokról szóló szóbeli választ igénylő kérdésre, mert Japán az Európai Unió egyik legnagyobb befektetője.

Source Sentence: A large proportion of these erroneous payments could have been prevented by the Member States.
Translation: E hibás kifizetések nagy részét a tagállamok megakadályozhatták volna.
Reference Sentence: E hibás kifizetések nagy részét megakadályozhatták volna a tagállamok.

Source Sentence: It should have been completely self-evident a very long time ago that the EU's institutions had to be bound by the values we all endorse, but it was not so.
Translation: Nagyon régen teljesen nyilvánvalónak kellett lennie, hogy az uniós intézményeket mindannyian támogatott értékekkel kell kötniük, de ez nem így volt.
Reference Sentence: Már régen magától értetődőnek kellene lennie, hogy a mindannyiunk által támogatott értékek az EU intézményeiben is legyenek kötelezők, de nem így van.

Source Sentence: The vote will take place tomorrow at 11.30 a.m.
Translation: A szavazás holnap 11:30-kor kerül sor.
Reference Sentence: A szavazásra holnap délelőtt 11.30-kor kerül sor.

Source Sentence: These objectives are so important and so ambitious that they really afford a transformational vision for undertaking measures against global warming, thus providing the necessary example and world leadership.
Translation: Ezek a célok annyira fontosak és olyan ambiciózusak, hogy valóban képesek transzformációs látást nyújtani a globális felmelegedés elleni intézkedések meghozatalára, így a szükséges példát és a világ vezetőjét.
Reference Sentence: Ezek a célkitűzések annyira fontosak és olyan ambiciózusak, hogy a korábbihoz képest alapvetően más víziót követelnek meg a globális felmelegedéssel kapcsolatos intézkedések terén, mely példamutató és a világban vezető helyet biztosít.

Source Sentence: Whether we have been successful or whether we are deluding ourselves with the budgetary commitment for the Lisbon Strategy will hopefully become clear at the latest when the required analysis has been carried out.
Translation: Hogy sikeresek vagyunk, vagy csalunk magunkat a lisszaboni stratégiával kapcsolatos költségvetési elkötelezettséggel, remélhetőleg legkésőbb világossá válik a szükséges elemzés végrehajtásakor.
Reference Sentence: Az, hogy sikeresek voltunk-e, vagy csak a Lisszaboni Stratégia költségvetési kötelezettségvállalásával próbáljuk áltatni magunkat, remélhetőleg világossá fog válni legkésőbb akkor, amikor a szükséges elemzések megtörténtek.

Source Sentence: It is of course quite incorrect to assert, as Mr Helmer does, that the EU costs the economy EUR 350 billion and the internal market does not bring that many benefits, so the cost of EU regulation exceeds the benefits of the single market.
Translation: Természetesen elég helytelen azt állítani, mint Helmer úr, hogy az EU 350 milliárd eurót költi a gazdaságnak, és a belső piac nem hozza ezt a sok előnyeit, így az uniós rendelet költsége meghaladja az egységes piac előnyeit.
Reference Sentence: Természetesen helytelen az a Helmer úr által hangoztatott állítás, miszerint az EU a gazdaságnak 350 milliárd euróba kerül, és hogy a belső piac nem hoz ennyi hasznot, tehát az EU szabályozás költsége nagyobb, mint az egységes piac kapcsán elkönyvelhető haszon.

Source Sentence: This shows that the promises to bring an end to tax havens and financial derivatives have fallen by the wayside.
Translation: Ez azt mutatja, hogy az adópiacok és a pénzügyi származtatások megszüntetésére irányuló ígéretek az útvonalon esnek.
Reference Sentence: Ez azt mutatja, hogy az adóparadicsomok és a származékos pénzügyi termékek megszüntetésére tett ígéretek vereséget szenvedtek.

Source Sentence: I would like to give you a couple of examples, particularly concerning Community law on the environment.
Translation: Néhány példát szeretnék adni, különösen a közösségi környezetvédelmi joggal kapcsolatban.
Reference Sentence: Említenék néhány példát, elsősorban a környezetvédelmet érintő közösségi jog területéről.

Source Sentence: People who think rationally on this matter are accused of lacking moral principles, and simply - as was the case with me today - they are not given the opportunity to speak in a 'democratic' way.
Translation: Azokat az embereket, akik racionálisan gondolkodnak erről, az erkölcsi elvek hiánya miatt vádolják, és egyszerűen – mint ma – nem kapnak lehetőséget arra, hogy „demokratikus” módon beszéljenek.
Reference Sentence: Azokat, akik ebben a kérdésben racionálisan gondolkodnak, erkölcsi alapelvek hiányával vádolják, és egyszerűen - amint ez ma velem is megtörtént - "demokratikus módon” nem adtak nekik lehetőséget a felszólalásra.

Source Sentence: That is why we set out quite clearly in the new strategy what objectives we want to achieve through this closer involvement: genuine support for reforms in the field of human rights, democracy, support for economic development, investment support, protection of the environment, environmental sustainability, development of energy and transport links, as also measures to tackle common challenges such as drugs trafficking.
Translation: Questo è il motivo per cui nella nuova strategia specifica chiaramente quali obiettivi vogliamo raggiungere attraverso questo coinvolgimento più stretto: un vero sostegno alle riforme in materia di diritti umani, la democrazia, il sostegno allo sviluppo economico, il sostegno agli investimenti, la protezione dell'ambiente, la sostenibilità ambientale, lo sviluppo di collegamenti energetici e dei trasporti, nonché le misure per affrontare sfide comuni come il traffico di droghe.
Reference Sentence: Questa è la ragione per cui abbiamo definito chiaramente nella nuova strategia quali obiettivi intendiamo ottenere tramite questo più stretto coinvolgimento: sostegno autentico alle riforme nel settore dei diritti umani, della democrazia, del supporto allo sviluppo economico e agli investimenti, della protezione dell'ambiente, della sostenibilità ambientale, dello sviluppo dell'energia e di collegamenti in materia di trasporti, nonché misure volte ad affrontare sfide comuni quali il traffico di droga.

Source Sentence: This requires the training programme to be flexible.
Translation: Questo richiede che il programma di formazione sia flessibile.
Reference Sentence: Pertanto il programma di formazione deve essere flessibile.

Source Sentence: Without this a great deal can go wrong.
Translation: Senza questo, molte cose possono sbagliare.
Reference Sentence: Mancando questa, molte cose possono andare male.

Source Sentence: I am confident that the Council can heed positive efforts.
Translation: Sono sicuro che il Consiglio possa fare sforzi positivi.
Reference Sentence: Sono certa che il Consiglio non ignorerà sforzi così proficui.

Source Sentence: The companies are hardly likely to tell them that researchers have started asking questions about the link between exposure to pesticides and the steadily increasing incidence of certain conditions such as Parkinson's disease, Alzheimer's, prostate cancer, brain tumours and congenital deformities.
Translation: Le aziende sono difficilmente probabili di dire loro che i ricercatori hanno iniziato a chiedere domande sul legame tra l'esposizione a pesticidi e l'incidenza costantemente crescente di alcune condizioni come la malattia di Parkinson, l'Alzheimer, il cancro alla prostata, i tumori cerebrali e le deformità congenite.
Reference Sentence: E proprio questi ultimi non riferiranno loro che gli scienziati iniziano a porsi delle domande sul legame esistente fra l'esposizione ai pesticidi e la progressione regolare di alcune malattie, fra cui il morbo di Parkinson, il morbo di Alzheimer, il cancro alla prostata, i tumori cerebrali e le malformazioni congenite.

Source Sentence: The firm stance adopted by the European Parliament on the rights of persons travelling by bus or coach means that, from now on, transport operators will provide information, assistance and compensation across the whole EU to comply with passengers' rights.
Translation: La posizione solida adottata dal Parlamento europeo sui diritti delle persone che viaggiano in autobus o in allenatore significa che, a partire da ora, gli operatori di trasporti forniranno informazioni, assistenza e compensazione in tutta l'UE per rispettare i diritti dei passeggeri.
Reference Sentence: La posizione risoluta adottata dal Parlamento europeo sui diritti delle persone che viaggiano in autobus o pullman significa che, da questo momento in poi, gli operatori dei trasporti forniranno informazioni, assistenza e risarcimento in tutta l'UE per conformarsi ai diritti dei passeggeri.

Source Sentence: Mrs Müller, we shall see what music accompanies the Council's reply!
Translation: La signora Müller, vedremo quale musica accompagna la risposta del Consiglio!
Reference Sentence: Onorevole Müller, sentiremo con quale musica risponderà il Consiglio al suo intervento!

Source Sentence: Now we have to recognize that the Union - I am thinking mostly of the Council even though in this respect the Irish presidency largely escapes this criticism - but in general the Union and in particular the Council have not always shown a clear willingness to defend human rights when the Union has been faced with a concrete situation.
Translation: Ora dobbiamo riconoscere che l'Unione - penso soprattutto al Consiglio, anche se in questo senso la presidenza irlandese scapa in gran parte di questa critica - ma in generale l'Unione e in particolare il Consiglio non hanno sempre mostrato una chiara volontà di difendere i diritti umani quando l'Unione è affrontata una situazione concreta.
Reference Sentence: Orbene, è giocoforza constatare che l'Unione - penso soprattutto al Consiglio, anche se, su questo piano, la presidenza irlandese sfugge ampiamente a questa critica - ma in modo generale, l'Unione e in particolare il Consiglio, non hanno ancora manifestato una volontà chiara di difendere i diritti dell'uomo quando l'Unione si trova di fronte ad una situazione concreta.

Source Sentence: We must not criminalise the captain. This is important.
Translation: Non dobbiamo criminalizzare il capitano, questo è importante.
Reference Sentence: Si tratta di un punto molto importante: quest'uomo si trova ancora agli arresti domiciliari e deve presentarsi ogni giorno alla polizia.

Source Sentence: On the other hand, the right for spouses or life partners to legally set up a company is just as vital.
Translation: D'altra parte, il diritto dei coniugi o dei partner di vita di istituire legalmente una società è altrettanto vitale.
Reference Sentence: Altrettanto fondamentale è il diritto dei coniugi coadiuvanti o dei partner riconosciuti a istituire legittimamente un'azienda.

Source Sentence: Why should that be?
Translation: Perché dovrebbe essere così?
Reference Sentence: Perché mai?

Source Sentence: This is a huge legislative package which has raised our status once again, for example, as a legislator on the world stage, and in putting us in a position to compete once more with the United States.
Translation: Questo è un enorme pacchetto legislativo che ha nuovamente sollevato il nostro status, ad esempio, come legislatore sul palco mondiale, e che ci mette in una posizione di competere ancora una volta con gli Stati Uniti.
Reference Sentence: Si tratta di un enorme pacchetto legislativo che ha nuovamente elevato il nostro di legislatori, ad esempio, a livello mondiale, e che ci ha messo in grado di competere ancora una volta con gli Stati Uniti.

Source Sentence: As shown by the votes of the Committee on Budgetary Control, the reports by Mrs Rühle and Mrs Stauner are heading in this direction.
Translation: Come dimostrato dai voti del Comitato per il controllo di bilancio, le relazioni della sig. Rühle e della sig. Stauner stanno andando in questa direzione.
Reference Sentence: Come si evince dai voti espressi in seno alla commissione per il controllo dei bilanci, le relazioni delle onorevoli Rühle e Stauner vanno, crediamo, in questa direzione.

Source Sentence: The intention is, therefore, to enforce hygiene rules at all stages, from the farm to the table.
Translation: L’intenzione è quindi di applicare le regole di igiene in tutte le fasi, dalla fattoria al tavolo.
Reference Sentence: L’intenzione è quindi l’applicazione delle norme in materia di igiene in tutte le fasi, dalla produzione al consumo.

Source Sentence: I think it is important to understand, however, the perspective of my committee.
Translation: Tuttavia, penso che sia importante capire la prospettiva del mio comitato.
Reference Sentence: Tuttavia, ritengo sia importante capire il punto di vista della mia commissione.

Source Sentence: The reason I want to remind you of these two figures and these two concepts is because it is most important to highlight the difficulties we find ourselves in today, as my colleagues have done.
Translation: Il motivo per cui voglio ricordare queste due figure e questi due concetti è perché è più importante evidenziare le difficoltà che ci troviamo oggi, come hanno fatto i miei colleghi.
Reference Sentence: Il motivo che mi ha spinta a ricordare queste due cifre e queste due nozioni è la necessità di insistere principalmente sulle difficoltà attuali, come hanno fatto i miei colleghi.

Source Sentence: Yes - we need the European Union precisely for such matters.
Translation: Sì, abbiamo bisogno dell’Unione europea proprio per questioni.
Reference Sentence: Sì, abbiamo bisogno dell'Unione europea proprio per questioni come questa.

Source Sentence: The Colom report shows the necessity for the Council and Parliament to get an interinstitutional agreement and an agreement on a financial perspective.
Translation: La relazione Colom mostra la necessità che il Consiglio e il Parlamento raggiungino un accordo interistituzionale e un accordo su una prospettiva finanziaria.
Reference Sentence: La relazione dell'onorevole Colom sottolinea l'esigenza di un accordo interistituzionale da parte del Consiglio e del Parlamento europeo, in particolare un accordo sulle prospettive finanziarie.

Source Sentence: Thank you very much, Commissioner Vitorino.
Translation: Grazie molto, commissario Vitorino.
Reference Sentence: La ringrazio, Commissario Vitorino.

Source Sentence: This debate should go in a different direction and come from a different committee.
Translation: Questo dibattito dovrebbe andare in una direzione diversa e provenire da un comitato diverso.
Reference Sentence: La presente discussione dovrebbe andare in una direzione diversa e provenire da una commissione diversa.

Source Sentence: I have to deplore a few mistakes in the printing of the text.
Translation: Es atvainojos par dažām kļūdām tekstā.
Reference Sentence: Man ir jānorāda uz dažām kļūdām drukātajā tekstā.

Source Sentence: On the labour markets, for example, activation policies can be very helpful.
Translation: Piemēram, darba tirgū aktivēšanas politika var būt ļoti noderīga.
Reference Sentence: Piemēram, attiecībā uz darba tirgiem aktivizēšanas politika var būt ļoti noderīga.

Source Sentence: Illegal phone tapping has become prosecutors' investigation method of choice.
Translation: Nelegāls telefona klāsts ir kļuvusi par prokuratūras izmeklēšanas izvēles metodi.
Reference Sentence: Nelegāla pieslēgšanās telefona sarunām ir kļuvusi par prokuroru izmantoto izmeklēšanas metodi.

Source Sentence: The market is not working.
Translation: Tirgus nav darbojas.
Reference Sentence: Tirgus nedarbojas.

Source Sentence: Gangs of soldiers are regularly involved in attacks, robbery and rape.
Translation: Krievijas karavīri regulāri ir iesaistījušies uzbrukumi, ļaudis un vardarbība.
Reference Sentence: Karavīru bandas ir regulāri iesaistītas uzbrukumos, laupīšanā un izvarošanā.

Source Sentence: For precisely this reason we regard as hypocritical the alleged concerns over the rise of far-right and paramilitary organisations in Europe, and we reject every attempt to equate the class struggle, the struggles of the workers' and popular movement and communist ideology with extremist ideologies, as an unacceptable attempt to instil fear in people.
Translation: Tieši tāpēc mēs uzskatu, ka apgalvojumi par ārkārtas un par militāro organizāciju izaugsmi Eiropā ir hipokritiski, un mēs noraidām jebkādu mēģinājumu līdzsvarot klases cīņu, darba un tautas kustības cīņu un komunistiskās ideoloģijas ar ekstremistiem ideoloģijām, kā nepieņemamu mēģinājumu iedvesmot bailes cilvēkiem.
Reference Sentence: Tieši šī iemesla dēļ mēs uzskatām, ka paustās bažas par galēji labēju un parlamentāru organizāciju pieaugumu Eiropā ir liekulīgas, un mēs noraidām visus mēģinājumus pielīdzināt šķiru cīņu, strādnieku un tautas kustības cīņu un komunisma ideoloģiju ekstrēmām ideoloģijām kā nepieņemamu mēģinājumu iedzīt cilvēkiem bailes.

Source Sentence: I support all of this.
Translation: Es atbalstīju visu to.
Reference Sentence: Es to visu atbalstu.

Source Sentence: When will people be told the truth?
Translation: Kad cilvēki sacīs patiesību?
Reference Sentence: Kad cilvēkiem teiks taisnību?

Source Sentence: As for the financial aspect, I called for the initial proposal to be refocused.
Translation: Attiecībā uz finanšu aspektiem, es pieprasīju, lai sāktu iesniegtos priekšlikumus.
Reference Sentence: Runājot par finansiālo aspektu, es tomēr aicināju pievērst lielāku vērību sākotnējam priekšlikumam.

Source Sentence: So we ask the Commission to send a clear message and take clear steps.
Translation: Tāpēc mēs lūdzam Komisiju sūtīt skaidru ziņojumu un veikt skaidrus soļus.
Reference Sentence: Tāpēc mēs lūdzam Komisiju sūtīt Baltkrievijai skaidru vēsti un spert skaidrus soļus.

Source Sentence: An important element is that, in third states that prohibit encryption, special rules apply: electronic transfer of data between consulates or between an external service provider and the Member State would be banned, and Member States would have to ensure that the electronic data is transferred physically in fully encrypted form on a CD which has special conditions attached to it.
Translation: Svarīgs elements ir tas, ka trešajā valstī, kas aizliedz šifrēšanu, piemēro īpašie noteikumi: elektroniskā datu pārsūtīšana starp konsulātiem vai starp ārējo pakalpojumu sniedzēju un dalībvalstīm būtu aizliegta, un dalībvalstīm būtu jānodrošina, lai elektroniskie dati fiziski pārsūtīti pilnībā šifrētajā formā uz CD, kurā ir pievienoti īpaši nosacījumi.
Reference Sentence: Svarīgs elements ir tas, ka trešajās valstīs, kur ir aizliegta šifrēšana, tiek piemēroti īpaši noteikumi: elektroniska datu pārraidīšana starp konsulātiem vai starp ārējo pakalpojumu sniedzēju un dalībvalsti būtu aizliegta un dalībvalstij būtu jānodrošina elektronisko datu fiziska pārraidīšana pilnīgi šifrētā veidā kompaktdiskā, kam ir īpaši nosacījumi.

Source Sentence: Amendment 1 stems from an error in the German translation, since what Mr Graefe zu Baringdorf is proposing is exactly what I proposed but, as I said, the German translation of my recital is inadequate.
Translation: 1. pielikums izriet no vāciešu tulkojuma kļūdas, jo to, ko J. Graefe zu Baringdorf ierosina, ir tieši tas, ko es ierosinu, bet, kā es teicu, manas recitācijas vāciešu tulkojums ir nepietiekams.
Reference Sentence: Grozījums Nr. 1 ir radies tulkojuma kļūdas dēļ, kas ieviesusies vācu valodas versijā, jo Graefe zu Baringdorf kunga piedāvājums ir tieši tas, ko ierosināju arī es, bet, kā jau teicu, manis rakstītā apsvēruma tulkojums vācu valodā ir neadekvāts.

Source Sentence: Globalisation is the mainspring of democracy and prosperity for underdeveloped countries.
Translation: Globalizācija ir demokrātija un labklājība mazāk attīstītajām valstīm.
Reference Sentence: Neattīstītajām valstīm globalizācija ir demokrātijas un labklājības virzītājspēks.

Source Sentence: I also welcome the planned incentives for eco-innovations but, in my opinion, a critical issue remains: the decision on emissions from so-called completed vehicles, meaning those built in a number of stages.
Translation: Es arī apmierinu plānotās iniciatīvas ekoloģijas inovācijām, bet manuprāt, joprojām joprojām ir kritiska problēma: lēmums par tā saukto pabeigto transportlīdzekļu emisijām, kas nozīmē, ka tie, kas izgatavoti vairākos posmos.
Reference Sentence: Es arī atzinīgi vērtēju plānotos stimulus ekojauninājumiem, taču, manuprāt, kritiski svarīgs jautājums joprojām ir šis: lēmums par emisijām no tā sauktajiem pabeigtajiem transportlīdzekļiem, ar to domājot transportlīdzekļus, ko būvē vairākos posmos.

Source Sentence: Mr President, among the projects that the EU has encouraged is the single electricity market on the island of Ireland.
Translation: Eiropas Komisijas priekšsēdētājs, viens no projektiem, ko ES ir atbalstījusi, ir vienīgais elektrības tirgus Īrijas salā.
Reference Sentence: Priekšsēdētāja kungs! To projektu starpā, ko atbalstījusi ES, ir vienotais elektroenerģijas tirgus Īrijas salā.

Source Sentence: (PL) Mr President, I think that this is a unique coincidence, because I am going to speak about the very same topic.
Translation: (PL) Priekšsēdētājs, es domāju, ka tas ir unikāls notikums, jo es runāju par to pašu jautājumu.
Reference Sentence: (PL) Priekšsēdētāja kungs, es uzskatu, ka šī ir unikāla sagadīšanās, jo es vēlos runāt par to pašu tēmu.

Source Sentence: I hope, too, that a new form of cooperation will also develop at last between officials and clients.
Translation: Es ceru, ka galu galā tiks attīstīta arī jauna sadarbības forma starp oficiāliem un klientiem.
Reference Sentence: Es ceru, ka attīstīsies jauns sadarbības veids, vismaz starp amatpersonām un klientiem.

Source Sentence: Mauritania is a poor country that is highly dependent on the sector, so keeping the agreement with the European Union could be beneficial to both signatories.
Translation: Mauritānija ir nabadzīga valsts, kas ir ļoti atkarīga no sektora, tāpēc vienošanās ar Eiropas Savienību varētu būt noderīga abiem parakstītajām valstīm.
Reference Sentence: Mauritānija ir nabadzīga valsts, kura ir ļoti atkarīga no šīs nozares, tāpēc nolīguma saglabāšana ar Eiropas Savienību varētu dot labumu abiem parakstītājiem.

Source Sentence: Presently, the focus seems to be on near-term, fast-start finance, but we also need long-term commitments.
Translation: Pašlaik, šķiet, ir vērts vērsties uz īstermiņa, ātri sākotnējo finansējumu, bet mums ir nepieciešams arī ilgtermiņa saistības.
Reference Sentence: Patlaban galvenā uzmanība tiek pievērsta īstermiņa, drīzam finansējumam, tomēr saistībām jābūt arī attiecībā uz ilgtermiņu.

Source Sentence: Secondly, we have greater clarity surrounding the CE mark but I agree with Mrs McCarthy and Mrs Gebhardt that we need to work on a real safety label in the future.
Translation: Otrkārt, mums ir lielāka skaidrība ap CE marķējumu, bet es piekrītu, ka nākotnē mums ir nepieciešams strādāt par reālu drošības marķējumu.
Reference Sentence: Turklāt mums ir lielāka skaidrība attiecībā uz CE marķējumu, bet es piekrītu A. McCarthy un E. Gebhardt, ka turpmāk mums ir jāstrādā pie reāla drošības marķējuma.

Source Sentence: But I do not support the use of simplified procedure in the future and I think it would be a good idea for us to have a hearing on the Slot Allocation Directive, perhaps in the autumn or winter when we come back.
Translation: Bet aš nepritaria supaprastintos procedūros naudojimui ateityje ir manau, kad būtų gera idėja mums turėti klausymą apie lošimų paskirstymo direktyvą, ypač rudenį ar žiemą, kai grįšime.
Reference Sentence: Bet aš nepritariu, kad supaprastinta procedūra būtų taikoma ateityje ir manau, kad būtų gera mintis dėl laiko tarpsnių paskirstymo direktyvos surengti posėdį galbūt rudenį ar žiemą, kai sugrįšime atgal.

Source Sentence: It is indeed the case that the Council's compromise refers to potential flexibility at the level of the social partners and collective agreements.
Translation: Iš tiesų Tarybos kompromisas reiškia galimą lankstumą socialinių partnerių ir kolektyvinių susitarimų lygmeniu.
Reference Sentence: Tarybos kompromise iš tiesų kalbama apie galimą lankstumą socialinių partnerių ir kolektyvinių susitarimų lygmeniu.

Source Sentence: I would like to take this opportunity to welcome the Executive Committee of the German War Graves Commission (Volksbund Deutsche Kriegsgräberfürsorge) from Baden-Württemberg under its chair, Mr Nothelfer.
Translation: Norėčiau pasinaudoti šia proga pasveikinti Vokietijos karo kapų komisijos (Volksbund Deutsche Kriegsgräberfürsorge) vykdomąjį komitetą iš Baden-Württembergas, kurio pirmininkauja P. Nothelfer.
Reference Sentence: Norėčiau pasinaudoti šia proga ir pasveikinti Vykdomojo komiteto Vokietijos karių kapų priežiūros susivienijimo komisiją (vok. Volksbund Deutsche Kriegsgräberfürsorge) iš Badeno Viurtembergo ir jos pirmininką N. Nothelferį.

Source Sentence: (RO) Prior to Romania's accession to the European Union, there were many voices in this Parliament claiming that the Roma people are discriminated against in Romania.
Translation: (RO) Prieš Rumunijos įstojimą į Europos Sąjungą šiame parlamente buvo daug balsų, kurie teigė, kad Rumunijoje romai yra diskriminuojami.
Reference Sentence: (RO) Iki Rumunijos įstojimo į Europos Sąjungą šiame Parlamente daug kas sakė, kad Rumunijoje diskriminuojami romai.

Source Sentence: The steps needed to ensure safe food have much in common with the steps needed for a more efficient fight against climate change, improved development aid, the development of other commercial structures, greater transparency on the commodity markets and measures against speculation.
Translation: Žingsniai, kurių reikia užtikrinti saugią maistą, turi daug bendro su veiksmingesnių veiksmų kovai su klimato kaita, geresnės vystymosi pagalbos, kitų komercinių struktūrų plėtra, didesnės prekių rinkų skaidrumo ir kovos su spekuliacija priemonių.
Reference Sentence: Žingsniai, kurių reikia imtis, siekiant užtikrinti saugų maistą, labai panašūs į žingsnius, kurių reikia imtis siekiant užtikrinti veiksmingesnę kovą su klimato kaita, patobulinta parama vystymuisi, kitų komercinių struktūrų plėtra, didesniu skaidrumu prekių rinkoje ir priemonėmis prieš spekuliaciją.

Source Sentence: I think, at the very least, a proper time to have this discussion would be when we have the discussion on the budget for the future, meaning after 2013.
Translation: Manau, bent jau tinkamas laikas šią diskusiją turėti, kai bus diskusijos apie ateities biudžetą, ty po 2013 m.
Reference Sentence: Mano manymu, tinkamas laikas šias diskusijas surengti ateis po diskusijų dėl ateities biudžeto, t. y. po 2013 m.

Source Sentence: Documents related to decisions that have not yet been taken, or reflecting internal discussions, are not the same as other documents.
Translation: Dokumentai, susiję su sprendimais, kurie dar nėra priimti, arba kurie atspindi vidaus diskusijas, nėra tokie pat kaip kiti dokumentai.
Reference Sentence: Dokumentai, susiję su dar nepriimtais sprendimais, arba atspindintys vidines diskusijas, nėra lygiaverčiai kitiems dokumentams.

Source Sentence: In our other amendment, we aim to make it possible to lower the VAT rate on renovation and repair work in order to save energy.
Translation: Kitais pakeitimais siekiame, kad būtų galima sumažinti PVM tarifą renovacijos ir remonto darbams, siekiant taupyti energiją.
Reference Sentence: Kito mūsų pateikto pakeitimo tikslas - sudaryti galimybę PVM lengvatą taikyti pastatų atnaujinimo ir remonto darbams, kuriais siekiama taupyti energiją.

Source Sentence: Woman is a great person in our land, and she is dignified, whether she is Jewish, Christian or Muslim, although she probably faced injustice because of men.
Translation: Moteris yra puikus žmogus mūsų šalyje, ir ji yra pagerbta, nesvarbu, ar ji yra žydų, krikščionių ar musulmonų, nors ji tikriausiai susiduria su neteisybėmis dėl vyrų.
Reference Sentence: Moteris yra didis žmogus mūsų žemėje ir ji yra verta pagarbos, ar ji būtų žydė, krikščionar musulmonė, nors ji, galbūt, patyrneteisybę dėl vyro.

Source Sentence: Mr Lamberts, I implore you to keep it brief, let us see if you can enlighten your colleague with your point of view in just thirty seconds, shall we?
Translation: Pone Lamberts, prašau jums išlaikyti trumpą, pažiūrėkime, ar galite apšviesti savo kolegą savo požiūriu vos per trisdešimt sekundžių, ar mes?
Reference Sentence: Pone Ph. Lambertsai, labai prašau kalbėti trumpai, pažiūrėkime, ar galėsite išsakyti kolegai savo nuomonę per trisdešimt sekundžių, bandom?

Source Sentence: Dozens of human lives were lost, hundreds of individuals were injured, thousands of animals were killed, whole villages were burned to the ground and thousands of acres of forests were annihilated.
Translation: Prarado dešimtys žmonių gyvybių, buvo sužeisti šimtai žmonių, buvo nužudyti tūkstančiai gyvūnų, visi kaimai buvo sudeginti iki žemės ir sunaikinti tūkstančius hektarų miškų.
Reference Sentence: Dešimtys žuvusiųjų, šimtai sužeistų, sudegtūkstančiai gyvūnų, ištisi kaimai iki pamatų ir buvo sunaikinta tūkstančiai akrų miškų.

Source Sentence: I was especially pleased about that.
Translation: Aš buvau ypač patenkintas tuo.
Reference Sentence: Tuo buvau ypač patenkinta.

Source Sentence: I would also like to say that we do not regard lobbyism as something bad per se.
Translation: Taip pat norėčiau pasakyti, kad mes nepažįstame lobizmo kaip kažką blogo.
Reference Sentence: Taip pat norėčiau pasakyti, kad nemanome, kad pats lobizmas yra negerai.

Source Sentence: The Commission expressed this view in the reasoned opinion that was sent to Ireland on 14 November.
Translation: Šią nuomonę Komisija išreiškė pagrįstoje nuomonėje, siunčiamoje Airijai lapkričio 14 dieną.
Reference Sentence: Šį požiūrį Komisija pateiklapkričio 14 d. Airijai išsiųstoje pagrįstojoje nuomonėje.

Source Sentence: When revising expenditure programmes, the Court suggests applying a set of principles to ensure that European added value is likely, that the objectives are clear, that the schemes are as realistic and simple as is reasonably possible, and that accountability is also clear.
Translation: Peržiūrėdamas išlaidų programas, Teisingumo Teismas siūlo taikyti principų rinkinį, siekiant užtikrinti, kad Europos pridėtinė vertė būtų tikėtina, kad tikslai būtų aiški, kad sistemos būtų kuo realistinės ir paprastos, ir kad atskaitomybė būtų aiški.
Reference Sentence: Persvarstę išlaidų programas, Audito Rūmai siūlo taikyti tam tikrus principus siekiant užtikrinti, kad Europos mastu būtų kuriama papildoma nauda, kad tikslai būtų aiškūs, kad programos būtų kuo tikroviškesnės ir paprastesnės, kiek tai pagrįstai įmanoma, ir kad atskaitomybtaip pat būtų aiški.

Source Sentence: On the contrary, we should support the reports which propose postponing discharge.
Translation: Priešingai, turėtume remti ataskaitas, kuriomis siūloma atidėti atleidimą.
Reference Sentence: Priešingai, turėtume remti pranešimus, kuriuose siūloma atidėti biudžeto įvykdymo patvirtinimą.

Source Sentence: Since social conditions in the various Member States are deteriorating, it is unacceptable for funds to be channelled away from the employment and social inclusion area towards other priorities that have been defined in the meantime, even if it is to the area of microfinance.
Translation: Kadangi socialinės sąlygos įvairiose valstybėse narėse blogėja, nepriimtina, kad lėšos būtų nukreiptos nuo užimtumo ir socialinės įtraukties srityje į kitus tuo metu nustatytus prioritetus, net jei tai susiję su mikrofinansų sritimi.
Reference Sentence: Kadangi socialinės sąlygos įvairiose valstybėse narėse blogėja, nepriimtina, kad lėšos iš užimtumo ir socialinės įtraukties srities būtų nukreipiamos į kitus prioritetus, kurie buvo nustatyti tuo metu, net jei jos nukreipiamos į mikrofinansų sritį.

Source Sentence: Madam President, in accordance with the challenge of the EU development cooperation policy for the new Member States, I shall focus on the national strategy for education in Romania.
Translation: Pone Pirmininko, atsižvelgiant į ES vystymosi bendradarbiavimo politikos iššūkį naujoms valstybėms narėms, aš sutelksiu dėmesį į nacionalinę švietimo strategiją Rumunijoje.
Reference Sentence: Ponia pirmininke, remiantis ES plėtros bendradarbiavimo politikos iššūkiais naujoms valstybėms narėms, norėčiau atkreipti dėmesį į nacionalinę Rumunijos švietimo strategiją.

Source Sentence: It is not enough to just tap at the door; a responsible parliament must stop this undesirable development.
Translation: Nepakanka tiesiog paliesti prie durų; atsakingas parlamentas turi sustabdyti šį nepageidaujamą vystymąsi.
Reference Sentence: Neužtenka vien tik pabarbenti į duris, atsakingas Parlamentas privalo padaryti galą šiai nepageidaujamai įvykių raidai.

Source Sentence: The process has taken too long.
Translation: Procesas užtruko per ilgai.
Reference Sentence: Procesas užsitęsper ilgai.

Source Sentence: This was a continuous problem, raised time and again with me by my constituents.
Translation: Był to nieustannie problem, podnoszony z nami od czasu do czasu przez moich członków.
Reference Sentence: To był nieustanny problem i moi wyborcy wielokrotnie się z nim do mnie zwracali.

Source Sentence: This in turn requires intervention in the market and improved marketing in the sector, improving the first-sale price, increasing pay for work by fishermen, reducing the margins of middlemen and promoting fair distribution of added value throughout the value chain of this sector.
Translation: To z kolei wymaga interwencji na rynku i poprawy marketingu w sektorze, poprawy ceny pierwszej sprzedaży, zwiększenia wynagrodzeń rybaków za pracę, zmniejszania marż pośredników i promowania sprawiedliwego dystrybucji wartości dodanej w całym łańcuchu wartości tego sektora.
Reference Sentence: To z kolei wymaga interwencji na rynku i lepszego marketingu w sektorze, zwiększenia ceny pierwszej sprzedaży, wyższych wynagrodzeń za pracę dla rybaków, zmniejszenia marży pośrednika oraz propagowania uczciwego rozmieszczenia wartości dodanej w całym łańcuchu wartości w danym sektorze.

Source Sentence: (DE) Mr President, ladies and gentlemen, once again this very basic question poses itself: are environmental protection, climate protection and financial and industrial policy compatible?
Translation: Panie Przewodniczący, panie i panie, znowu zadaje sobie to bardzo podstawowe pytanie: czy ochrona środowiska, ochrona klimatu i polityka finansowa i przemysłowa są zgodne?
Reference Sentence: (DE) Panie przewodniczący, panie i panowie! Jeszcze raz to podstawowe pytanie nasuwa się samo: czy polityka ochrony środowiska, ochrony klimatu oraz polityka finansowa i przemysłowa są ze sobą zgodne?

Source Sentence: It is a reality that we in Ireland are not comfortable with, but we accept the right of all countries to choose their own energy mix, and the fact that our neighbours utilise nuclear power means that we cannot afford to ignore the issue.
Translation: Jest to rzeczywistość, z którą w Irlandii nie jesteśmy zadowoleni, ale zaakceptujemy prawo wszystkich krajów do wyboru własnej mieszanki energetycznej, a fakt, że nasi sąsiedzi korzystają z energii jądrowej, oznacza, że nie możemy sobie pozwolić na ignorowanie problemu.
Reference Sentence: Rzeczywistością jest również to, że w Irlandii akceptujemy prawo każdego kraju do własnego wyboru kombinacji źródeł energii, choć nie czujemy się z tym komfortowo, a fakt, że nasi sąsiedzi korzystają z energii jądrowej oznacza, że nie możemy tego ignorować.

Source Sentence: It is unacceptable that energy market inefficiencies are distorting the market to the detriment of businesses and consumers.
Translation: Nie jest do przyjęcia, że nieefektywność rynku energetycznego zakłóca rynek na szkodę przedsiębiorstw i konsumentów.
Reference Sentence: Niedopuszczalne jest, by niewydolność rynku energetycznego powodowała zakłócenia rynku ze szkodą dla przedsiębiorstw i konsumentów.

Source Sentence: If in 1970 there were approximately 200 million passengers in the EU-15, in 2000 their number reached approximately 600 million.
Translation: Jeśli w 1970 roku w UE 15 było około 200 milionów pasażerów, w 2000 roku ich liczba wyniosła około 600 milionów pasażerów.
Reference Sentence: O ile w 1970 r. mieliśmy około 200 milionów pasażerów w UE-15, to w 2000 r. liczba ta osiągnęła w przybliżeniu 600 milionów.

Source Sentence: 'Levels of knowledge of the Treaty suggest public opinion [in Ireland] is more like Nice 1 than Nice 2' - the words of Professor Richard Sinnott, not mine.
Translation: "Poziom wiedzy o Traktatu sugeruje, że opinia publiczna [w Irlandii] jest bardziej podobna do Nice 1 niż Nice 2" - powiedział profesor Richard Sinnott, a nie mój.
Reference Sentence: "Poziomy wiedzy na temat traktatu wskazują że opinia publiczna [w Irlandii] przywodzi na myśl raczej pierwsze, a nie drugie drugiego referendum w sprawie traktatu nicejskiego” - to słowa profesora Richarda Sinnotta, a nie moje.

Source Sentence: I think a referendum is the best way forward because it is the most direct form of democracy and it would bring Europe closer to its citizens and their freedom of choice.
Translation: Myślę, że referendum jest najlepszą drogą do przodu, ponieważ jest to najbardziej bezpośrednia forma demokracji i przyniósłaby Europę bliżej swoich obywateli i ich wolności wyboru.
Reference Sentence: Uważam, że najlepszym wyjściem jest referendum, ponieważ stanowi najbardziej bezpośrednią formę demokracji i zbliży Europę do swoich obywateli, dając im wolność wyboru.

Source Sentence: The Penal Code: Article 301 has already been mentioned, that is quite clear.
Translation: Zgodnie z art. 301 Kodeksu Karnego już wspomniano, co jest całkiem oczywiste.
Reference Sentence: Jedną z nich jest kodeks karny: wspomniano już o artykule 301 i w tym względzie nie ma żadnych wątpliwości.

Source Sentence: I would like to say to all new Members of the European Parliament that the Minister is a former Member of this House, and so is one of us.
Translation: Chciałbym powiedzieć wszystkim nowym posłom Parlamentu Europejskiego, że minister jest byłym członkiem tej Izby, i tak jest jednym z nas.
Reference Sentence: Wszystkim nowym członkom Parlamentu Europejskiego chciałem powiedzieć, że pani minister to jest była członkini Parlamentu Europejskiego, czyli jedna z naszych koleżanek na tej sali.

Source Sentence: We have worked with the European Environment Agency on a report assessing the frequency of disasters in Europe and their impact on humans, the economies and ecosystems.
Translation: Współpracujemy z Europejską Agencją Środowiska w sprawie sprawozdania oceniającego częstotliwość katastrof w Europie i ich wpływ na ludzi, gospodarki i ekosystemy.
Reference Sentence: Wspólnie z Europejską Agencją Środowiska pracowaliśmy nad sprawozdaniem oceniającym częstotliwość występowania katastrof w Europie oraz skutki tych katastrof dla ludzi, gospodarek i ekosystemów.

Source Sentence: That is why I was not surprised when, during the exchange of views in the Committee on Civil Liberties, Justice and Home Affairs a few weeks ago, the Commission - although supporting the current proposal - mentioned it would come up with a new proposal at a later stage.
Translation: Dlatego nie byłem zaskoczony, gdy kilka tygodni temu podczas wymiany poglądów w Komitetie do spraw wolności obywatelskich, sprawiedliwości i spraw wewnętrznych Komisja – mimo że popiera obecny wniosek – powiedziała, że w późniejszym etapie pojawi się nowy wniosek.
Reference Sentence: Dlatego nie byłam zaskoczona, kiedy podczas wymiany opinii w Komisji Wolności Obywatelskich, Sprawiedliwości i Spraw Wewnętrznych kilka tygodni temu Komisja - jakkolwiek popierając wniosek w obecnym brzmieniu - wspomniała, że jest skłonna przedłożyć nowy wniosek na późniejszym etapie.

Source Sentence: We are trying to deal with industrial land and industrial pollution; we are talking about urban development and then about agricultural land and agricultural soils.
Translation: Staramy się radzić sobie z gruntami przemysłowymi i zanieczyszczeniem przemysłowym; mówimy o rozwoju miejskim, a następnie o gruntach rolnych i glebach rolnych.
Reference Sentence: Próbujemy zajmować się terenami przemysłowymi i zanieczyszczeniami przemysłowymi; mówimy o rozwoju obszarów miejskich, a następnie o gruntach rolnych i glebach uprawnych.

Source Sentence: There is no silver bullet here.
Translation: Nie ma tutaj srebrnych kulek.
Reference Sentence: Nie ma tu cudownego panaceum.

Source Sentence: I would also urge Parliament to consider very strong support for the common agricultural policy in the very important debates that are coming up.
Translation: Wzywam również Parlament do rozważenia bardzo silnego wsparcia wspólnej polityki rolnej w bardzo ważnych debatach, które nadchodzą.
Reference Sentence: Nakłaniam też Parlament, by rozważył mocne poparcie dla wspólnej polityki rolnej w nadchodzących ważnych debatach.

Source Sentence: I deem this to be very serious and would ask Members to consider the fact that, while many might not fully understand the science of this, if we do not accept the Socialist amendment and accept the PPE amendment, it means that we are going against the advice of scientists and are creating two total allowable catch areas within a single stock.
Translation: Uważam to za bardzo poważne i poprosiłbym członków, aby wzięli pod uwagę fakt, że chociaż wielu może nie w pełni zrozumieć nauki o tym, jeśli nie zaakceptujemy poprawki socjalistycznej i zaakceptujemy poprawki PPE, oznacza to, że idziemy przeciwko radzie naukowców i tworzymy dwa całkowicie dopuszczalne obszary połowowe w jednym magazynie.
Reference Sentence: Uważam to za bardzo ważne i mimo że wielu z posłów może nie w pełni rozumieć uzasadnienie naukowe, to proszę wziąć pod uwagę, że jeśli nie przyjmiemy poprawki Socjalistów, a przyjmiemy poprawkę PPE, to postąpimy wbrew opinii naukowców i utworzymy dwa obszary całkowitych dopuszczalnych połowów dla jednego stada.

Source Sentence: These priorities are reflected in the shifts between the various headings of the Multiannual Financial Framework, and can also be seen in the financing of the European Economic Recovery Plan, which rightly puts a heavy emphasis on new technology.
Translation: Priorytety te odzwierciedlają się w zmianach między różnymi tytułami wieloletnich ram finansowych, a także można zaobserwować w finansowaniu europejskiego planu odzyskiwania gospodarczego, który słusznie stawia silny nacisk na nowe technologie.
Reference Sentence: Priorytety te daje się dostrzec w przesunięciach między poszczególnymi działami wieloletnich ram finansowych, jak też w finansowaniu europejskiego planu naprawy gospodarczej, który słusznie kładzie wielki nacisk na nowe technologie.

Source Sentence: The EU maintains its view that a single legally binding instrument is the best way to give shape to the post-2012 framework.
Translation: UE utrzymuje swoją opinię, że jednolity prawnie wiążący instrument jest najlepszym sposobem na kształtowanie ram po 2012 r.
Reference Sentence: Unia Europejska podtrzymuje swoje stanowisko, że najlepszym rozwiązaniem problemu kształtu ram na okres po 2012 roku jest jednolity dokument, prawnie wiążący.

Source Sentence: I therefore abstained from voting on this report.
Translation: Dlatego powstrzymałem się od głosowania w sprawie tego raportu.
Reference Sentence: W związku wstrzymałem się od głosu nad przyjęciem przedmiotowego sprawozdania.

Source Sentence: Fish, like other animals, cannot be restricted to certain territories, so assessing whether one country cares more than another would be the subject of endless arguments.
Translation: Ryby, podobnie jak inne zwierzęta, nie mogą być ograniczone do określonych terytoriów, więc ocena tego, czy jeden kraj obchodzi więcej niż drugi byłby przedmiotem nieskończonych argumentów.
Reference Sentence: Ryb, podobnie jak pozostałych zwierząt, nie da się ograniczyć do niektórych terytoriów, zatem ocena, czy jeden kraj troszczy się bardziej, niż inny, byłaby przedmiotem niekończących się sporów.

Source Sentence: We have had a one-sided debate here about the Constitution.
Translation: Houve um debate unilateral sobre a Constituição.
Reference Sentence: Assistimos, aqui, a um debate parcial sobre a Constituição.

Source Sentence: I am, of course, happy and proud, but setting myself aside I should like to say to the other women Members of the European Parliament that my promotion is also theirs.
Translation: Estou, é claro, feliz e orgulho, mas deixando-me de lado, gostaria de dizer às outras mulheres deputadas do Parlamento Europeu que a minha promoção também é sua.
Reference Sentence: É certo que me sinto feliz e orgulhosa, mas, ultrapassando qualquer consideração a título pessoal, queria afirmar às nossas colegas mulheres do Parlamento que esta promoção é também a sua.

Source Sentence: It must be made very clear to the public that Parliament's power to put forward amendments is limited only by the Treaty itself. And even the Treaty is an open one, since it includes an open-ended article - Article 235 - which allows the Council to extend its powers should that prove necessary, when requested by the Commission and supported by Parliament.
Translation: Deve ser muito claro para o público que o poder do Parlamento de apresentar alterações é limitado apenas pelo próprio Tratado.E mesmo o Tratado é um aberto, uma vez que inclui um artigo aberto - Artigo 235 - que permite ao Conselho ampliar os seus poderes se provavelmente necessário, quando solicitado pela Comissão e apoiado pelo Parlamento.
Reference Sentence: Ora, a competência deste Parlamento para apresentar alterações - e há que dizê-lo muito claramente à opinião pública - só é limitada pelo próprio Tratado e, inclusivamente, este Tratado é um acto aberto, uma vez que contém um «artigo janela» - o artigo 235º - que permite ao Conselho ampliar as competências na medida do necessário, a pedido da Comissão e com o apoio do Parlamento.

Source Sentence: No viable internal market for electricity has been established. It is paradoxical that the more our networks are connected, the more vulnerable we are to power cuts.
Translation: Nenhum mercado interno viável para a eletricidade foi estabelecido.É paradoxal que quanto mais nossas redes estão conectadas, mais vulneráveis somos a cortes de energia.
Reference Sentence: Não foi criado um mercado interno viável da electricidade e é paradoxal constatar que, quanto mais as nossas redes estão interligadas, mais vulneráveis ficamos aos cortes de energia.

Source Sentence: All the European institutions that depend on the European Union budget have to be thoroughly audited by the Court of Auditors and by all entities with that function.
Translation: Todas as instituições europeias que dependem do orçamento da União Europeia devem ser cuidadosamente auditadas pelo Tribunal de Contas e por todas as entidades com essa função.
Reference Sentence: por escrito. - Todas as instituições europeias que dependem do orçamento da União Europeia têm de ser fiscalizadas, de forma rigorosa, pelo Tribunal de Contas e por todas as entidades com essa função.

Source Sentence: I regard the production of electricity or district heating from biomass as a most important contribution to the development of sustainable energy supplies in the EU countries.
Translation: Considero a produção de eletricidade ou aquecimento distritório a partir da biomassa como uma contribuição mais importante para o desenvolvimento dos suprimentos de energia sustentáveis nos países da UE.
Reference Sentence: Considero que a produção de electricidade ou mesmo de calor à distância a partir da biomassa é um contributo muito importante para o desenvolvimento de um aprovisionamento energético sustentável nos países da União.

Source Sentence: But we have the impression that this growth, sustained firstly by the performance of the United States, and then by the productivity gains of the new economy, by the new information and communication technologies, is driven by the general world situation, even despite our handicaps.
Translation: Mas temos a impressão de que este crescimento, sustentado primeiro pelo desempenho dos Estados Unidos, e depois pelos ganhos de produtividade da nova economia, pelas novas tecnologias da informação e da comunicação, é impulsionado pela situação global, mesmo apesar de nossas deficiências.
Reference Sentence: Mas fica a impressão de que este crescimento, alimentado em primeiro lugar pelos desempenhos dos Estados Unidos, em seguida pelos ganhos de produtividade da nova economia e pelas novas tecnologias da informação e da comunicação, é estimulado pela marcha geral do mundo, apesar das nossas deficiências.

Source Sentence: My last point concerns budget assistance.
Translation: A última questão é a assistência orçamental.
Reference Sentence: O meu último comentário tem a ver com a assistência orçamental.

Source Sentence: The principle and approach is often referred to at national, European and global level when questions related to human health and the environment are discussed.
Translation: O princípio e a abordagem são frequentemente referidos a nível nacional, europeu e global quando são discutidas questões relacionadas com a saúde humana e o meio ambiente.
Reference Sentence: O princípio e a abordagem da precaução são referidos com frequência a nível nacional, europeu e global, quando se discutem questões relacionadas com a saúde humana e o ambiente.

Source Sentence: Our Presidency supports constructive cooperation with the European Parliament based on trust.
Translation: A nossa Presidência apoia uma cooperação construtiva com o Parlamento Europeu com base na confiança.
Reference Sentence: A nossa Presidência aposta numa cooperação construtiva e baseada na confiança com o Parlamento Europeu.

Source Sentence: When I was in captivity, I got the chance to study the social behaviour of my kidnappers, obviously at some length.
Translation: Quando eu estava em prisão, eu tive a oportunidade de estudar o comportamento social dos meus sequestradores, obviamente a algum comprimento.
Reference Sentence: No cativeiro, tive a possibilidade de analisar o comportamento social dos meus raptores, com todo o tempo do mundo.

Source Sentence: Many of my colleagues support the idea of the Fund, but regret the lack of money involved.
Translation: Muitos dos meus colegas apoiam a ideia do Fundo, mas lamentam a falta de dinheiro envolvido.
Reference Sentence: Muitos dos meus colegas apoiam a criação do Fundo, mas lamentam a falta de verbas.

Source Sentence: We can do this by legislative and budgetary means, as well as through the Structural Funds and research programmes.
Translation: Podemos fazê-lo através de meios legislativos e orçamentais, bem como através dos Fundos Estruturais e dos programas de investigação.
Reference Sentence: Podemos fazê-lo por meios legislativos e orçamentais e, também, através dos Fundos Estruturais e de programas de investigação.

Source Sentence: The world was shocked by the video images shown recently in The Hague of young men being executed.
Translation: O mundo ficou chocado pelas imagens de vídeo mostradas recentemente em The Hague de jovens homens sendo executados.
Reference Sentence: O mundo ficou chocado com as imagens de vídeo recentemente mostradas em Haia, da execução de homens jovens.

Source Sentence: President Pastrana's offer must have our full support and must have sufficient international economic support so that it can meet the social demands that are really at the root of this violence.
Translation: A proposta do Presidente Pastrana deve ter nosso pleno apoio e ter um apoio econômico internacional suficiente para que possa atender às exigências sociais que estão realmente na raiz desta violência.
Reference Sentence: A oferta do Presidente Pastrana deve merecer o nosso apoio e o apoio económico internacional suficiente para se poder dar resposta às reivindicações sociais que estão, no fundo, na origem desta violência.

Source Sentence: Mr President, while supporting these principles, the Commission cannot accept these amendments, which do not correspond to provisions concerning relations between the institutions established in the comitology decision, or which interfere with the executive powers of the Commission.
Translation: Senhor Presidente, enquanto apoia esses princípios, a Comissão não pode aceitar essas alterações, que não correspondem às disposições relativas às relações entre as instituições estabelecidas na decisão de comitologia, ou que interfere com os poderes executivo da Comissão.
Reference Sentence: Senhor Presidente, embora adira a esses princípios, a Comissão não pode aceitar essas alterações que não correspondem às disposições sobre as relações entre as Instituições estabelecidas na decisão de comitologia, ou que interferem com os poderes executivos da Comissão.

Source Sentence: Mrs Cresson was a candidate for a third term as Mayor in 1995.
Translation: Cresson foi candidata para um terceiro mandato como prefeito em 1995.
Reference Sentence: A senhora comissária Cresson foi candidata, em 1995, a um terceiro mandato de presidente de uma autarquia.

Source Sentence: We should seek to reduce that dependency through measures of efficiency, conservation, substitution and new technologies.
Translation: Devemos procurar reduzir essa dependência através de medidas de eficiência, conservação, substituição e novas tecnologias.
Reference Sentence: Deveremos procurar reduzir essa dependência, através de medidas de eficiência, conservação e substituição, e das novas tecnologias.

Source Sentence: Membership of the European Union may perhaps lead to a solution to the division of Cyprus, or its occupation as I prefer to describe it.
Translation: A adesão à União Europeia pode certamente levar a uma solução à divisão de Chipre, ou à sua ocupação, como eu prefiro descrever.
Reference Sentence: A adesão à União Europeia poderá, porventura, conduzir a uma solução para a divisão ou - como prefiro chamar-lhe - ocupação de Chipre.

Source Sentence: (ES) Mr President, Israel has murdered some heroes of humanitarian solidarity, of generosity and of altruism.
Translation: Israel matou alguns heróis da solidariedade humanitária, da generosidade e do altruismo.
Reference Sentence: (ES) Senhor Presidente, Israel assassinou alguns heróis da solidariedade humanitária, da generosidade e do altruísmo.

Source Sentence: It will not be sacrificed in discussions on the future common agricultural policy budget.
Translation: Ea nu va fi sacrificată în discuțiile privind viitorul buget al politicii agricole comune.
Reference Sentence: Acesta nu va fi sacrificat în discuțiile privind bugetul viitoarei politici agricole comune.

Source Sentence: In the course of our debate, we focused on certain parts of the world, but in the course of further speeches, honourable Members have raised a whole range of different issues which we still must continue to deal with.
Translation: În cursul dezbaterii noastre, ne-am concentrat pe anumite părți ale lumii, dar în cursul discursurilor ulterioare, membrii onorari au ridicat o întreagă gamă de probleme diferite cu care trebuie să continuăm să abordăm.
Reference Sentence: Pe parcursul dezbaterii noastre, ne-am concentrat pe diferite părți ale lumii, dar în discursurile adiționale, onorabilii deputați au ridicat o serie întreagă de probleme diferite pe care trebuie să continuăm să le rezolvăm.

Source Sentence: draftsman of the opinion of the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection. - (ES) Madam President, firstly I would like to thank the rapporteur, Mrs Herczog, for her report and her cooperation with the draftsmen of the opinions of the other committees.
Translation: - (ES) Doamna Președinte, mai întâi aș dori să mulțumesc raportoarei, doamna Herczog, pentru raportul și cooperarea ei cu proiectatorii avizelor celorlalte comisii.
Reference Sentence: raportor pentru avizul Comisiei pentru piaţa internă şi protecţia consumatorilor - (ES) Doamnă preşedintă, aş dori mai întâi să mulţumesc raportorului, doamna Herczog, pentru raportul domniei sale şi pentru cooperarea cu raportorii pentru aviz ai celorlalte comisii.

Source Sentence: We should let them come to Europe!
Translation: Trebuie să le lăsați să vină în Europa!
Reference Sentence: Ar trebui să-i lăsăm să vină în Europa!

Source Sentence: I think we also need to take on board that they come with their own culture, tradition and languages.
Translation: Cred că trebuie, de asemenea, să luăm la bord faptul că ei vin cu propria lor cultură, tradiție și limbi.
Reference Sentence: Cred că trebuie să avem în vedere şi faptul că sosesc cu propria lor cultură, propria lor tradiţie şi propria limbă.

Source Sentence: But we could never get back what we lost in the crisis.
Translation: Nu am reuşit niciodată să recuperăm ceea ce am pierdut în criză.
Reference Sentence: Dar nu vom putea recupera niciodată ceea ce am pierdut în timpul crizei.

Source Sentence: You even have the support of the Irish members of the Group of the European People's Party (Christian Democrats).
Translation: Aveți chiar sprijinul membrilor irlandezi ai Grupului Partidului Poporului European (Democrații Creștini).
Reference Sentence: Aveți până și susținerea deputaților irlandezi din Grupul Partidului Popular European (Creștin Democrat).

Source Sentence: The EU can, and must, use numerous tools to deter such actions, such as asset freezes, travel bans, etc. The EU must review its policies towards those countries and make full and effective use of the existing support given through the European Neighbourhood and Partnership Instrument, the European Instrument for Democracy and Human Rights and the Instrument for Stability, in order to urgently assist the countries and civil societies in the Middle East and in the Gulf in their transition towards democracy and respect for human rights.
Translation: UE poate și trebuie să utilizeze numeroase instrumente pentru a opri astfel de acțiuni, cum ar fi înghețarea activelor, interdicția de călătorie etc. UE trebuie să își revizuiască politicile față de aceste țări și să utilizeze pe deplin și eficient sprijinul existent oferit prin Instrumentul european de vecinătate și parteneriat, Instrumentul european pentru democrație și drepturile omului și Instrumentul de stabilitate, pentru a asista urgent țările și societățile civile din Orientul Mijlociu și Golf în tranziția lor către democrație și respectarea drepturilor omului.
Reference Sentence: UE poate și trebuie să utilizeze numeroase instrumente pentru a descuraja astfel de acțiuni, cum ar fi înghețarea activelor, interdicțiile de a călători peste hotare etc. UE trebuie să își revizuiască politicile față de aceste țări și să utilizeze pe deplin și eficient sprijinul existent acordat prin intermediul Instrumentului european de vecinătate și parteneriat, Instrumentul european pentru democrație și drepturile omului și Instrumentul pentru stabilitate, pentru a ajuta în regim de urgență țările și societățile civile din Orientul Mijlociu și din Golf în tranziția lor spre democrație și respectarea drepturilor omului.

Source Sentence: Madam President, I believe this has been a very important debate: a debate on an issue that is at the heart of European concerns at the moment - the Greece issue - but, beyond that, on the economic situation of the European Union as a whole, a debate at which, by the way Mr Audy, the Presidency of the Council has been present, as agreed in Parliament: I represent the Presidency of the Council here.
Translation: Doamna Președinte, cred că aceasta a fost o dezbatere foarte importantă: o dezbatere pe o chestiune care este în centrul preocupărilor europene în acest moment - chestiunea Greciei - dar, mai mult decât atât, despre situația economică a Uniunii Europene în ansamblu, o dezbatere în care, prin mijlocul lui Audy, Președinția Consiliului a fost prezentă, așa cum a fost convenită în Parlament: reprezent aici Președinția Consiliului.
Reference Sentence: Dnă preşedintă, consider că aceasta a fost o dezbatere foarte importantă: o dezbatere asupra unei probleme aflate în centrul preocupărilor europene din prezent - problema Greciei - dar, dincolo de acest lucru, o dezbatere asupra situaţiei economice a Uniunii Europene în ansamblu, o dezbatere la care, apropo, dle Audy, Preşedinţia Consiliului a fost prezentă, aşa cum s-a stabilit, în Parlament: reprezint Preşedinţia Consiliului aici.

Source Sentence: Even the Mexican national human rights commission has repeatedly documented the increase in violent crime by the military.
Translation: Chiar și Comisia Națională Mexicană a Drepturilor Omului a documentat în repetate rânduri creșterea criminalității violente de către armata.
Reference Sentence: Chiar şi Comisia Naţională pentru Drepturile Omului a luat act în repetate rânduri de intensificarea crimelor violente comise de armată.

Source Sentence: Unfortunately, these oppressed people look to the billionaire and former Prime Minister, Thaksin Shinawatra, for a solution.
Translation: Din păcate, acești oameni opresiți caută miliardarul și fostul premier, Thaksin Shinawatra, pentru o soluție.
Reference Sentence: Din păcate, aceste persoane persecutate au apelat la fostul prim-ministru miliardar, Thaksin Shinawatra, în speranța unei soluții.

Source Sentence: Do you believe that the said programme can be extended?
Translation: Crezi ca acest program poate fi extins?
Reference Sentence: Credeţi că respectivul program poate fi prelungit?

Source Sentence: In fact, this is something worthy of an E (European) designation: European Electric.
Translation: De fapt, aceasta este ceva demn de o denumire E (European): European Electric.
Reference Sentence: De fapt, acest proiect merită o denumire de tipul E (European): European Electric.

Source Sentence: What is more, with these actions, it should be possible to convey a message of peace that promotes democratic values.
Translation: Mai mult, cu aceste acțiuni, ar trebui să fie posibilă transmiterea unui mesaj de pace care promovează valorile democratice.
Reference Sentence: Mai mult, cu aceste acţiuni, ar trebui să fie posibilă transmiterea unui mesaj de pace, care promovează valorile democratice.

Source Sentence: The interpretation told us it was 44, and yet you are announcing that 45 has been accepted.
Translation: Interpretarea ne-a spus că a fost 44 și totuși anunțați că 45 au fost acceptate.
Reference Sentence: Interpreții ne-au spus că este vorba de alineatul (44), însă ați anunțat că alineatul (45) a fost acceptat.

Source Sentence: Concerning the Saudi invasion in Bahrain, I would like to underline the fact that the six Gulf Cooperation Council states have a collective security agreement amongst themselves.
Translation: În ceea ce privește invazia saudită în Bahrain, vreau să subliniez faptul că cele șase state ale Consiliului de Cooperare din Golf au un acord colectiv de securitate între ei.
Reference Sentence: În ceea ce privește invazia Arabiei in Bahrain, aș dori să subliniez faptul că cele șase state ale Consiliului de Cooperare al Golfului au un acord de securitate colectivă între ele.

Source Sentence: We all know that seals are often killed under conditions in which the animals, which are mammals and capable of sensation, experience terrible pain and suffering.
Translation: Știm cu toții că sigiliile sunt adesea uciși în condiții în care animalele, care sunt mamifere și capabile de senzație, experimentează dureri și suferințe teribile.
Reference Sentence: Ştim cu toţii că focile sunt adesea omorâte în condiţii în care aceste animale, care sunt mamifere şi deci capabile de senzaţie, trec prin dureri şi suferinţe teribile.

Source Sentence: One important aspect is the digitisation of cultural productions, along with the need to create a proper single market for online content and services which will generate additional jobs.
Translation: Un aspect important este digitalizarea produselor culturale, împreună cu nevoia de a crea o piață unică adecvată pentru conținut și servicii online, care va genera locuri de muncă suplimentare.
Reference Sentence: Un aspect important este acela al digitalizării producțiilor culturale, concomitent cu nevoia de a crea o veritabilă piață unică a conținuturilor și serviciilor online, care să genereze locuri de muncă suplimentare.

Source Sentence: The only thing that pains me is that this discussion took place at such a late hour.
Translation: Singurul lucru care mă doare este că această discuție a avut loc la o oră atât de târziu.
Reference Sentence: Singurul lucru care mă deranjează este că această discuție a avut loc la această oră târzie.

Source Sentence: on behalf of the S&D Group. - Mr President, as the previous speaker said, and as the Commissioner said, this is a deeply complex problem, so the oral question that we pose today is a bid from our group, certainly, and I am sure from all the groups, to renew and refresh the debate on the Roma issue.
Translation: În numele Grupului S&D. - Domnule Președinte, așa cum a spus precedentul vorbitor și așa cum a spus comisarul, aceasta este o problemă profund complexă, deci întrebarea orală pe care o punem astăzi este o ofertă din partea grupului nostru, mai ales și sunt sigură din partea tuturor grupurilor, să reînnoiască și să reînnoiască dezbaterea cu privire la problema romilor.
Reference Sentence: în numele Grupului S&D. - Dle preşedinte, după cum a spus antevorbitorul meu şi după cum a spus comisarul, aceasta este o problemă foarte complexă, astfel încât întrebarea cu solicitare de răspuns oral adresată astăzi constituie o încercare din partea grupului nostru, şi sunt sigur din partea tuturor celorlalte grupuri, de a reînnoi şi reîmprospăta dezbaterea problemei romilor.

Source Sentence: It needs hope for a better future, which means accession to the EU one day.
Translation: Potrebuje nádej na lepšiu budúcnosť, čo znamená, že jedného dňa vstúpi do EÚ.
Reference Sentence: Potrebuje nádej na lepšiu budúcnosť, čo znamená budúce pristúpenie k EÚ.

Source Sentence: I feel that we are seriously compromising children and their ability to learn when we allow cocktails of colourings, preservatives and additives into their food.
Translation: Mám pocit, že vážne ohrozujeme deti a ich schopnosť učiť sa, keď dovolíme koktejly farbivých látok, konzervačných látok a prísad do ich potravín.
Reference Sentence: Domnievam sa, že urobíme vážny ústupok voči deťom a ich schopnosti učiť sa, ak povolíme zmes farbív, konzervačných prísad a prídavných látok v ich potravinách.

Source Sentence: Personally, I will defend this approach at the November Development Affairs Council, and the global financial crisis will be at the centre of my political concerns during the weeks ahead.
Translation: Osobne obhajujem tento prístup na novembrovskej Rade pre rozvoj a globálna finančná kríza bude v priebehu nasledujúcich týždňov v centre mojich politických obáv.
Reference Sentence: Ja osobne tento prístup podporím na novembrovom zasadnutí Výboru pre rozvoj a globálna finančná kríza bude v najbližších týždňoch stredobodom mojich politických záujmov.

Source Sentence: I therefore fully support the demands made by the Socialist Group in the European Parliament in its question.
Translation: Preto plne podporujem požiadavky Socialistické skupiny v Európskom parlamente v tejto otázke.
Reference Sentence: Preto plne podporujem požiadavky, ktoré kladie Socialistická skupina v Európskom parlamente v súvislosti s touto otázkou.

Source Sentence: It is wrong for important matters such as combating poverty and social exclusion not to be discussed openly here.
Translation: Je nesprávne o dôležitých záležitostiach, ako je boj proti chudobe a sociálnemu vylúčeniu, aby sa tu otvorene diskutovali.
Reference Sentence: Nie je správne, že také dôležité problémy, ako boj proti chudobe a sociálne vyčlenenie, tu nemôžeme otvorene prediskutovať.

Source Sentence: Anti-competitive practices have been discovered in the dairy sector in the United Kingdom and in Greece, and fines have been imposed on firms involved in those anti-competitive practices.
Translation: V odvetví mlieka v Spojenom kráľovstve a Grécku boli objavené antikonkurenčné postupy a pokuty boli uložené spoločnostiam zapojeným do týchto antikonkurenčných postupov.
Reference Sentence: V sektore mlieka v Spojenom kráľovstve a Grécku boli odhalené praktiky v rozpore s hospodárskou súťažou a zainteresovaným firmám boli za to udelené pokuty.

Source Sentence: For the time being, the CAP does not address environmental issues in a consistent manner.
Translation: V súčasnosti sa SPP nevyjadruje konzistentne otázky životného prostredia.
Reference Sentence: SPP zatiaľ nerieši otázky životného prostredia konzistentným spôsobom.

Source Sentence: Therefore, I suggest that the Commission consider not only those people at risk of losing their jobs, but also those who are finding it difficult to enter or return to the labour market.
Translation: Preto navrhujem, aby Komisia zvážila nielen tých ľudí, ktorí sú v ohrození straty zamestnania, ale aj tých, ktorí majú ťažké vstup alebo návrat na trh práce.
Reference Sentence: Navrhujem preto, aby Komisia zohľadnila nielen ľudí, ktorým hrozí riziko straty zamestnania, ale aj tých, ktorí majú problémy so vstupom alebo návratom na pracovný trh.

Source Sentence: These would be ways of bringing in revenue to combat poverty and other persistent economic and social problems.
Translation: Boli by to spôsoby, ako priniesť príjmy na boj proti chudobe a iným trvalým hospodárskym a sociálnym problémom.
Reference Sentence: Týmito spôsobmi by sa dali získať prostriedky na boj proti chudobe a ostatným pretrvávajúcim hospodárskym a sociálnym problémom.

Source Sentence: Where were you before?
Translation: Kde si bol predtým?
Reference Sentence: Kde ste boli tak dlho?

Source Sentence: The negotiators of the deposed President Zelaya did not establish, however, who should head the government of unity.
Translation: Vyjednávači odvolaného prezidenta Zelaya však neurčili, kto by mal viesť vládu jednoty.
Reference Sentence: Predstavitelia rokujúci v mene zvrhnutého prezidenta Zelayu však nestanovili, kto má stáť na čele vlády jednoty.

Source Sentence: That is why the G20 in Pittsburgh is so important, though the European Union itself should, of course, take vigorous action.
Translation: To je dôvod, prečo je G20 v Pittsburgh tak dôležitá, aj keď by mala Európska únia samozrejme prijať silné kroky.
Reference Sentence: Práve preto je samit G20 v Pittsburghu taký dôležitý, hoci aj Európska únia samotná by mala, samozrejme, prijať dôrazné opatrenia.

Source Sentence: As shadow rapporteur for the Committee on Culture and Education, I welcome the compromise that has been forged, especially the reduction of the minimum number of countries needed to register an initiative to one quarter of the Member States, and the fact that the European Parliament will play an active role in the public hearing of successful initiative proposals.
Translation: Ako tieňová spravodajca Výboru pre kultúru a vzdelávanie víta kompromis, ktorý bol zavedený, najmä zníženie minimálneho počtu krajín potrebných na zaregistrovanie iniciatívy na jednu štvrtinu členských štátov, a skutočnosť, že Európsky parlament bude aktívne zohrávať úlohu pri verejnom vypočutí úspešných návrhov iniciatív.
Reference Sentence: Ako tieňová spravodajkyňa Výboru pre kultúru a vzdelávanie vítam prijatý kompromis, najmä zníženie minimálneho počtu krajín potrebného na registráciu iniciatívy na jednu štvrtinu členských štátov, a skutočnosť, že Európsky parlament bude zohrávať aktívnu úlohu vo verejnom vypočutí úspešných návrhov iniciatív.

Source Sentence: They should not be allowed to get away with murder.
Translation: Nemali by sa im povoliť utiecť s vraždou.
Reference Sentence: Nemali by sme dovoliť, aby im prešla vražda.

Source Sentence: Last but not least, investments relating to energy efficiency do not figure on the list of the investments receiving financing.
Translation: V neposlednom rade, investície súvisiace s energetickou účinnosťou nie sú zahrnuté do zoznamu investícií, ktoré prijímajú financovanie.
Reference Sentence: V neposlednom rade, investície týkajúce sa energetickej účinnosti sa nenachádzajú na zozname financovaných investícií.

Source Sentence: Madam President, SIS II is a tale of attempts, failures and new attempts that has gone on for years.
Translation: SIS II je príbeh pokusov, zlyhaní a nových pokusov, ktoré prebiehajú už roky.
Reference Sentence: Vážená pani predsedajúca, SIS II je príbeh plný pokusov, neúspechov a nových pokusov, ktorý trvá roky.

Source Sentence: More and more Indians are asking for that, shocked after the terrible reaction of the regime to the effects of the cyclone.
Translation: Čoraz viac Indiánov to žiada, šokovaný po strašnej reakcii režimu na účinky cyklónu.
Reference Sentence: Žiada o to stále viac a viac indických občanov, ktorí sú šokovaní neospravedlniteľnou reakciou režimu na škody spôsobené cyklónom.

Source Sentence: Madam President, when we heard the recording from Mr Fariñas from Cuba this morning, I was impressed by the fact that he identified himself and his colleagues as a 'non-violent' opposition to the Cuban regime.
Translation: Pane prezidenta, keď sme dnes ráno počuli nahrávku od pána Fariñas z Kube, bol som prekvapený tým, že sám a jeho kolegovia identifikoval ako „ne násilnú“ opozíciu kubánskemu režimu.
Reference Sentence: Vážená pani predsedajúca, keď sme dnes ráno počuli nahrávku od pána Fariñasa z Kuby, zapôsobila na mňa skutočnosť, že seba a svojich kolegov označil za "nenásilnú" opozíciu kubánskeho režimu.

Source Sentence: I would like to make several remarks on the European Security Strategy and the Common Security and Defence Policy.
Translation: Chcel by som urobiť niekoľko pripomienok k európskej bezpečnostnej stratégii a spoločnej bezpečnostnej a obrannej politike.
Reference Sentence: Chcem vyjadriť niekoľko pripomienok k európskej bezpečnostnej stratégii a spoločnej bezpečnostnej a obrannej politike.

Source Sentence: As the Chairman of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, I would like to commend the Portuguese Presidency for having set as one of the main goals of its programme the issue of desertification and water shortage.
Translation: Ako predseda Výboru pre životné prostredie, verejné zdravie a bezpečnosť potravín chcel by som pochváliť portugalské predsedníctvo za to, že jeden z hlavných cieľov svojho programu stanovil otázku púšťovania a nedostatku vody.
Reference Sentence: Na začiatok mi dovoľte, aby som ako predseda Výboru pre životné prostredie privítal skutočnosť, že portugalské predsedníctvo si problém dezertifikácie a problém nedostatku vody vytýčilo ako jeden z hlavných cieľov svojho programu a svojho predsedníctva.

Source Sentence: Given that the creation of a civil defence force would be of particular assistance in supporting Member States' national authorities responsible for civil protection, what are the Council's views on the creation of a civil defence force?
Translation: Glede na to, da bi bila ustanovitev civilne obrambne sile iz posebne pomoči pri podpori nacionalnim organom držav članic, odgovornim za civilno zaščito, kakšna je stališča Sveta o ustanovitvi civilne obrambne sile?
