Source Sentence: Rosendale, a member of the hard-right Freedom Caucus, was one of the individuals who derailed the Wednesday votes. He views the top line number in Johnson's deal as being too high and as doing too little to cut the $34 trillion national debt.
Translation: Rosendale, greizsirdīgo brīvību Kaukusa loceklis, bija viens no indivīdiem, kas aizturēja trešdienas balsus. Viņš uzskata, ka Džonsona darījumu top līnijas numurs ir pārāk augsts un darīt pārāk maz, lai samazinātu $ 34 trilijonu valsts parādu.
Reference Sentence: Rozendeils, galēji labējo grupas Freedom Caucus dalībnieks, bija viens no tiem, kas apturēja trešdienas balsojumu. Viņaprāt, bruto summa Džonsona budžetā ir pārāk augsta, un tiek darīts pārāk maz, lai samazinātu valsts parādu 34 triljonu ASV dolāru apmērā.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: South Wales četras daļas The Now ir priecīgi izdalīt savu debitantu albumu, Too Hot To Handle, izmantojot True Music, un Callum pievienojas man tagad. Kā jūs darāt, Callum? Kā tas notiek? Jā, viss labi. Labs, jūs? Jā, es esmu ļoti labi. Paldies. Tas ir privilēģija runāt ar sevi, jo es esmu klausījies jūsu mūziku diezgan daudz kopš 2023. Tāpēc es tikai mīlu mūziku, un es domāju, ka tas ir kaut kas, ko mums noteikti nepieciešams šajās dienās diagrammās.
Reference Sentence: Dienvidvelsas grupa The Now, kurā ir četri dalībnieki, ar lepnumu izlaiž savu pirmo albumu Too Hot To Handle ierakstu studijā True Music, un tagad man pievienojas Kallums. Kā klājas, Kallum? Kā iet? Jā, viss labi. Labi, un tev? Jā, ļoti labi. Paldies. Runāt ar jums ir privilēģija, jo kopš 2023. gada es jūsu mūziku klausos diezgan bieži. Man vienkārši patīk šī mūzika, un, manuprāt, tai jābūt populārāko dziesmu sarakstā.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Translation: Rezultāti ir un, bumbiņas rullis, lūdzu, tas ir pilnībā atbilst manu ģimenes vēsturi. 89.9% britu un Īrijas ar lielāko daļu, kas koncentrējas uz Skotijas robežas, Rietumeiropas Īrijas, Velsas un kukurūzas. Tas nerāda daudz bretona tho, tāpēc vai viņi ir tik blakus kukurūzas viņi nerāda, kā atšķirīgs man vai mana bretona ģimene nebija sākotnēji no turienes.
Reference Sentence: Rezultāti saņemti un, tadammmm, lūdzu - tie pilnībā atbilst manai ģimenes vēsturei. 89,9% briti un īri ar lielāko koncentrāciju pie Skotijas robežas, Īrijas rietumos, Velsā un Kornvolā. Tur nav daudz bretoņu, tāpēc, vai nu viņi ir tik tuvi kornvoliešiem, ka manī atšķirība vairs nav manāma, vai arī mani bretoņu priekšteči nebija no turienes.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.
Translation: Tenuk en Kayel realiseerden zich echter snel dat ze niet alleen waren.Een tweede donkere wezens werden uit onder hen geschoten, en Tenuk was alleen in staat om een botsing te vermijden.
Reference Sentence: Maar Tenuk en Kayel hadden al snel door dat ze niet alleen waren. Een tweede duister wezen schoot onder hen vandaan en Tenuk wist maar net een botsing te voorkomen.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk twijfelde, stapte vervolgens terug en gaf zichzelf een beetje ruimte. Met een lage, enigszins pijnlijke grunt strekte het lichaam van Tenuk uit, zijn haar werd vervangen door schaal en zijn armen werd vervangen door vleugels. Hij veranderde snel in een normale, lichtblauwe Thraki, maar zijn ogen bleven rood.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk aarzelde en deed een stap terug om zichzelf wat ruimte te geven. Met een langzame, ietwat gepijnigde grom strekte zijn lichaam zich uit. Zijn vacht veranderde in schubben en zijn armen werden vleugels. Hij veranderde zichzelf snel in een normale, lichtblauwe thraki, maar zijn ogen bleven rood.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.
Translation: Ze vroeg zich af of ze ze daadwerkelijk zou laten binnengaan, in tegenstelling tot de vorige keren die ze vroegen. Ik heb nog steeds een bruis van de laatste keer. Ivory knielde uit het geheugen. Kari had een boek op hun schouder gegooid, maar toen ze zag wie het was, verontschuldigde ze zich meteen.
Reference Sentence: Ivory vroeg zich af of ze werkelijk binnen gelaten zou worden, in tegenstelling tot de vorige keren dat die het gevraagd had. Ik heb nog steeds een blauwe plek van de vorige keer, grinnikte Ivory daaraan terugdenkend. Kari had een boek naar Ivory's schouder gegooid, maar toen ze zag wie het was, bood ze meteen haar verontschuldigingen aan.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretaris-generaal van het Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, dat ongeveer 7.000 wijnproducenten in heel Europa vertegenwoordigt, is ontzegd van de bezorgdheid van de biermakers. Hij vertelde Euronews dat een markt die wordt gedomineerd door multinationale brouwerijconglomeraten geen vergelijking draagt met een markt die bijna volledig bestaat uit kleine binnenlandse producenten.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretaris-generaal van de branchevereniging Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, die circa 7000 wijnproducenten in heel Europa vertegenwoordigt, wuift de bezwaren van de bierbrouwers weg. Tegen Euronews zei hij dat een markt die gedomineerd wordt door internationaal opererende brouwerijconglomeraten in de verste verte niet vergeleken kan worden met een markt die bestaat uit kleine, binnenlandse producenten.

Source Sentence: Judging by the state of our hospitals, the SNP's talk of recovery plans and action plans is simply that - talk, and dangerous talk at that. We must not allow incompetent politicians to lull us into complicity in the demise of that great British institution, the National Health Service.
Translation: Oordeeld door de staat van onze ziekenhuizen, is het woord van de SNP over herstelplannen en actieplannen gewoon dat - praten, en gevaarlijk praten daarover.
Reference Sentence: Gezien de staat van onze ziekenhuizen is wat de SNP zegt over herstelplannen en actieplannen niet meer dan dat: loze woorden, en nog gevaarlijke loze woorden ook. We mogen niet toelaten dat incompetente politici ons het gevoel geven dat we medeplichtig zijn aan de teloorgang van dat geweldige Britse instituut, de National Health Service.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Is dat niet grappig? We hebben de helft van de mankracht achtergelaten, en we kunnen niet eens onthouden van elkaar kwetsen. Ik haastte zich op, Al was rond de hoek, dus ik zou mooi binnen zijn. Een blik achter mij zorgde ervoor dat ik niet meer werd gekleed terwijl ik voor een helder schitterend teken stond die zei: “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” Met langzamer stappen ging ik weer binnen – deze plaats was meer onder de cover, aangezien Alborn vaak zou nemen in mensen die werden gemuttigd en in Paltricus. Bij het openen van de deur waren de lichten uitgeschakeld, interessant genoeg – er waren geen Al. Geen vluchtelingen. Niets. Er was iets niet goed hier.
Reference Sentence: Is het niet bizar? De helft van de mensheid is overgebleven en nog kunnen we niet stoppen met elkaar te kwetsen. Haastig versnelde ik mijn pas, de winkel van Al was net om de hoek en binnen zou ik veilig zijn. Voor de helverlichte naam van "Alborn's Pawnshop!" keek ik nog even snel achterom om er zeker van te zijn dat ik niet meer achtervolgd werd. Met tragere passen stapte ik weer een deur binnen. Deze zaak was wat heimelijker, omdat Alborn vaak mensen in huis nam die gemuteerd waren en stiekem Paltricus binnengekomen waren. Binnen brandde geen licht en, gek genoeg, was Al er ook niet. Geen vluchtelingen. Niets. Hier klopte iets niet.

Translation: Rosendale, een lid van de hard-rechts Freedom Caucus, was een van de individuen die de woensdag stemmen verdronken. Hij ziet het toplijnnummer in Johnson's deal als te hoog en als te weinig te doen om de $34 biljoen nationale schulden te verminderen.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: South Wales vier stukjes The Now zijn trots op het vrijlaten van hun debuutalbum, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, en Callum sluit zich nu aan bij me. Hoe doe je, Callum? Hoe gaat het? Dus ik hou van de muziek, en ik denk dat het iets is wat we absoluut nodig hebben in de charts deze dagen.
Reference Sentence: The Now, de vier man sterke band uit Zuid-Wales, brengt met trots hun debuutalbum Too Hot To Handle uit via True Music, en Callum is hier nu bij me. Hoe gaat het, Callum? Alles goed? Ja prima, goed en jij? Ja, heel goed. Bedankt. Ik vind het een eer om jullie te spreken, want ik luister sinds 2023 heel veel naar jullie muziek. Ik vind jullie muziek fantastisch en wat mij betreft horen jullie zeker in de hitlijsten thuis.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Translation: De resultaten zijn in en, drum roll, alsjeblieft, het is volledig in overeenstemming met mijn familie geschiedenis. 89.9% Brits en Ierse met het grootste deel geconcentreerd in de Schotse grenzen, West-Ierland, Wales en Cornwall. Het toont niet veel breton tho dus of ze zijn zo dicht bij Cornish ze zien niet zo anders in mij of mijn breton familie was oorspronkelijk van daar.
Reference Sentence: De resultaten zijn binnen en – tromroffel graag – ze kloppen volledig met mijn familiegeschiedenis. 89,9% Brits en Iers, met name geconcentreerd aan de Schotse grenzen, West-Ierland, Wales en Cornwall. Er wordt niks vermeld over Bretons bloed, dus ofwel zit dat zo dicht bij Cornish dat er in mij geen verschil te zien is, ofwel kwam mijn Bretonse familie daar oorspronkelijk niet vandaan.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.
Translation: Jednak Tenuk i Kayel szybko zdają sobie sprawę, że nie są sami. Druga ciemna istota wystrzelona z pod nimi, a Tenuk po prostu udało się uniknąć zderzenia.
Reference Sentence: Aczkolwiek Tenuk i Kayel błyskawicznie uzmysłowili sobie, że nie są tam sami. Kolejne mroczne stworzenie wystrzeliło w górę spod nich, a Tenuk ledwie zdołał uniknąć zderzenia.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk wahaniał się, następnie skrócił, dając sobie trochę miejsca.Z niskim, lekko bolesnym gruntem ciało Tenuk rozciągnęło się, jego włosy zastąpiono skalami, a ręce zastąpiono skrzydłami. Szybko zmienił się w normalny, światło niebieskie Thraki, ale jego oczy pozostały czerwone.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk zwlekał, a następnie odsunął się, robiąc sobie więcej miejsca. Wydał słabe, trochę bolesne jękniecie, a jego ciało wyciągnęło się, sierść przeobraziła się w łuski, a ramiona zamieniły się w skrzydła. Błyskawicznie przekształcił się w zwyczajnego, jasnoniebieskiego Thrakiego, ale jego oczy dalej były czerwone.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.
Translation: Zastanawiali się, czy w rzeczywistości pozwoli im wejść, w przeciwieństwie do poprzednich czasów, gdy poszli do pytań. Wciąż mam brąz z ostatniego czasu. Ivory zmarł z pamięci. Kari rzucił książkę na ramiona, ale kiedy zobaczyła, kto to jest, natychmiast przeprosiła.
Reference Sentence: Zachodziła w głowę, czy tym razem pozwoli jej wejść do komnaty, w odróżnieniu do poprzednich sytuacji, gdy o to pytała. Ciągle mam stłuczenie z ostatniego razu. Ivory zaśmiała się, przypominając o tym sobie. Kari cisnęła księgą w jej ramię, ale kiedy dostrzegła, w kogo rzuciła, od razu przeprosiła.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, sekretarz generalny Komitetu Europejskiego ds. Przedsiębiorstw wina, który reprezentuje około 7000 producentów win w całej Europie, jest zwolniony z obaw producentów piwa. powiedział Euronews, że rynek dominowany przez wielonarodowe konglomeraty piwa nie jest w porównaniu z rynek składający się prawie w całości z małych krajowych producentów.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sanchez Recarte, sekretarz generalny stowarzyszenia handlowego Comite Europeen des Entrerprises Vins, które reprezentuje około 7000 producentów win w Europie, nie podziela obaw piwowarów. Powiedział Euronews, że rynek zdominowany przez międzynarodowe koncerny piwowarskie nie stanowi porównania z pojedynczym rynkiem składającym się praktycznie w całości z małych, lokalnych producentów.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Czyż nie jest to śmieszne?Mamy połowa siły ludzkiej i nie możemy nawet powstrzymać się od obrażenia nawzajem. Szybko pospieszyłem się, Al był wokół rogu, więc byłem dobrze wewnątrz. Spojrzenie za mną zapewniło, że nie jestem już obrzucany, gdy stoję przed jasnym błyszczącym znakiem, który czyta: „Alborn’s Pawnshop!” Z wolniejszymi krokami wkroczyłem ponownie – to miejsce było bardziej pod pokrywką, ponieważ Alborn często wziąłby w ludzi, którzy byli zmutowani i prześladowani do Paltricus. Po otwarciu drzwi, światła zostały wyłączone, ciekawie wystarczająco – nie było Al. Nie było żadnych uchodźców. Nic. Nie było tutaj.
Reference Sentence: Czyż to nie jest śmieszne? Dysponujemy tylko połową zasobów ludzkich i nie potrafimy nawet zaniechać wyrządzania sobie krzywdy. Bezzwłocznie przyspieszyłam kroku, lokal Ala znajdował się za zakrętem, a wewnątrz będę bezpieczna. Obejrzawszy się za siebie, uświadomiłam sobie, że nikt już za mną nie idzie. Stałam przed rozświetlonym szyldem, na którym widniał napis: „Lombard Alborna!”. Idąc już wolniej, weszłam do środka ponownie – ten lokal dział raczej pod przykrywką, gdyż Alborn regularnie gościł ludzi po przejściu mutacji, którzy przekradli się na teren Paltricusa. Jak tylko otworzyłam drzwi, światła zgasły, co ciekawe – Ala tam nie było. Zero uchodźców. Nikogo. Wydarzyło się tu coś niedobrego.

Source Sentence: These good quality stickers are about 50p each. They'll cost the same again to post. And way more in my own time to individually package and send them.
Translation: Te wysokiej jakości naklejki są około 50p każdy. Będą kosztować to samo ponownie, aby wysyłać. I jeszcze bardziej w moim własnym czasie, aby indywidualnie opakować i wysyłać je.
Reference Sentence: Te dobre jakościowo naklejki kosztują jakieś 50 pensów za sztukę. Wysyłka pocztą będzie kosztować tyle samo. I o wiele więcej, jeśli chodzi o nakład mojego własnego czasu, aby po kolei je zapakować i wysłać.

Source Sentence: So the challenges in this are already showing themselves. I'm likely going to have a VERY difficult time getting a medical clearance due to the FAA's stance on certain medications.
Translation: Tak więc wyzwania w tym już pokazują się.Prawdopodobnie będę miał bardzo trudny czas, aby uzyskać lekarstwo z powodu stanowiska FAA w sprawie niektórych leków.
Reference Sentence: Zatem wyzwania w tym zakresie już się ukazują. Prawdopodobnie będę miała BARDZO ciężką przeprawę z uzyskaniem zaświadczenia lekarskiego ze względu na stanowisko FAA w sprawie niektórych leków.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I could have, I guess, that makes sense. But I didn't have rental on my auto insurance, so that's my fault. So I guess I could have tried to do that and get that set up and tried to get a rental while I was down and out of a car. But even then, a rental wouldn't cover seven days. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Więc mój tata nie może dać mi jeźdź do pracy. A dla mnie praca jest około 27 mil. Więc tam i z powrotem byłby prawie 100 $ dziennie z Uberem. Nie spojrzałem na Lyft. Mogę mieć, myślę, że to ma sens. Ale nie miałem wynajem na moim ubezpieczeniu samochodowym, więc to jest moja wina. Więc myślę, że mogłem spróbować to zrobić i dostać to ustawić i próbować dostać wynajem, gdy byłem w dół i z samochodu. Ale nawet wtedy wynajem nie pokryłby siedmiu dni. Będę śnieżować, trzymać.
Reference Sentence: Czyli tata nie może zawozić mnie do pracy. A miejsce mojej pracy znajduje się w odległości jakichś 27 mil. Zatem kurs tam i z powrotem Uberem może kosztować około 100 dolarów na dzień. Nie sprawdzałam na Lyft. Powinnam była to zrobić, bo to może być sensowna opcja. Aczkolwiek moje ubezpieczenie samochodowe nie obejmowało opcji wynajmu, więc sama jestem sobie winna. Przypuszczam, że mogłam spróbować zająć się tym, załatwić wszystkie formalności i wypożyczyć auto, kiedy to przechodziłam gorszy okres i byłam bez samochodu. Jednak nawet wówczas wynajem nie pokrywałby całego tygodnia. Czekaj, bo za moment kichnę. Co za słabe kichnięcie.

Source Sentence: Saturday Cont:
Translation: sobotny rachunek:
Reference Sentence: Sobota cd.:

Source Sentence: Rosendale, a member of the hard-right Freedom Caucus, was one of the individuals who derailed the Wednesday votes. He views the top line number in Johnson's deal as being too high and as doing too little to cut the $34 trillion national debt.
Translation: Rosendale, członek twardo prawicowego Freedom Caucus, był jednym z osób, które odmówiły w środę głosowania. Uważa, że liczba górnej linii w porozumieniu Johnson jest zbyt wysoka i robi zbyt mało, aby zmniejszyć dług krajowy 34 bilionów dolarów.
Reference Sentence: Rosendale, członek skrajnie prawicowego Ruchu Wolności, był jedną z osób, które zablokowały środowe głosowanie. Uważa on, że górna wartość w ustawie Johnsona jest zbyt wysoka i że robi on zbyt mało, aby zmniejszyć publiczny dług wynoszący 34 biliony dolarów.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: South Wales cztery kawałki The Now są dumni z wydania swojego debütowego albumu, Too Hot To Handle, poprzez True Music, a Callum dołącza do mnie teraz. Jak to robisz, Callum? Jak to się dzieje? Tak, wszystko dobrze. Dobrze, sam? Tak, jestem bardzo dobry. Dziękuję. Jest to przywilej rozmawiać z wami, ponieważ słucham muzyki dość dużo od 2023 roku. Więc po prostu kocham muzykę, i myślę, że jest to coś, czego na pewno potrzebujemy w tych dniach na wykresach.
Reference Sentence: The Now, zespół w czteroosobowym składzie z południowej Walii, ma zaszczyt ogłosić wydanie swojego debiutanckiego albumu „Too Hot To Handle” w ramach projektu True Music. W tym momencie dołącza do mnie Callum. Co u ciebie, Callum? Co słychać? Tak, wszystko w porządku. U ciebie dobrze? Tak, mam się doskonale. Dzięki. To zaszczyt móc z tobą rozmawiać, gdyż jestem wiernym fanem waszej muzyki od 2023 roku. Ja najzwyczajniej uwielbiam tę muzykę i uważam, że bez wątpienia zasługujemy na taki rodzaj muzyki na współczesnych listach przebojów.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Translation: Wyniki są w i, drum roll, proszę, to jest całkowicie zgodne z moją historią rodzinną. 89.9% Brytyjczyków i Irlandii z większością skoncentrowane w szkockiej granicy, zachodniej Irlandii, Walii i muru kukurydzy. To nie pokazuje dużo breton tho, więc albo są tak blisko do kukurydzy, że nie wyglądają jak inny w mnie lub moja breton rodzina nie była pierwotnie stamtąd.
Reference Sentence: Mam rezultaty i, proszę o werble, jest to w pełnej zgodności z historią mej rodziny. 89,9% Brytyjczyków i Irlandczyków, z czego przeważająca cześć jest skupiona w obrębie Szkocji, zachodniej Irlandii, Walii i Kornwalii. Nie widać tu zbyt dużego pochodzenia bretońskiego, więc albo wyniki są tak bliskie pochodzenia kornwalijskiego, że nie są widoczne odrębnie u mnie, albo też moi bretońscy przodkowie nie pochodzili z tamtych rejonów.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.
Translation: No entanto, Tenuk e Kayel rapidamente perceberam que não estavam sozinhos. uma segunda criatura escura foi tirada de debaixo deles, e Tenuk apenas conseguiu evitar uma colisão.
Reference Sentence: No entanto, Tenuk e Kayel rapidamente se aperceberam de que não estavam sozinhos. Uma segunda criatura escura apareceu por baixo deles, e Tenuk mal conseguiu evitar uma colisão.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk hesitou, então passou para trás, dando-se um pouco de espaço. Com um grão baixo, ligeiramente doloroso, o corpo de Tenuk estendeu-se, seu pêlo foi substituído por escalas e seus braços foram substituídos por asas. Ele rapidamente se transformou em um Thraki normal, azul leve, mas seus olhos ficaram vermelhos.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk hesitou e deu um passo atrás, permitindo-se algum espaço. Com um grunhido grave e ligeiramente penoso, o corpo de Tenuk esticou-se, a sua pele foi substituída por escamas e os seus braços por asas. Rapidamente se transformou num Thraki normal, de cor azul-claro, mas os seus olhos permaneceram vermelhos.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.
Translation: Eles se perguntaram se ela realmente os deixaria entrar, ao contrário das vezes anteriores que eles foram perguntar. Eu ainda tenho uma brisa da última vez. Ivory chupou da memória. Kari tinha jogado um livro em seus ombros, mas quando viu quem era, ela pediu desculpas imediatamente.
Reference Sentence: Ivory perguntava-se se ela abriria a porta, ao contrário do que tinha acontecido das outras vezes. Ainda tenho uma nódoa negra desde a última vez, Ivory riu com a memória que surgiu. Kari tinha atirado um livro ao seu ombro, mas quando viu quem era, pediu perdão imediatamente.

Source Sentence: The ESP didn't go online immediately, let's give it a few minutes.
Translation: O ESP não foi online imediatamente, vamos dar-lhe alguns minutos.
Reference Sentence: O ESP não ficou logo online, por isso, vamos esperar mais alguns minutos.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretário-geral do Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, que representa cerca de 7.000 produtores de vinho em toda a Europa, é desmissível das preocupações dos produtores de cerveja. Ele disse à Euronews que um mercado dominado pelos conglomerados de cerveja multinacionais não é comparado com um composto quase inteiramente de pequenos produtores domésticos.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretário-geral da associação comercial Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, que representa cerca de 7000 produtores de vinho em toda a Europa, não atribui grande importância às preocupações dos produtores de cerveja. À Euronews, disse que não se pode comparar um mercado dominado por conglomerados de cervejarias multinacionais a um constituído quase exclusivamente por pequenos produtores nacionais.

Source Sentence: Judging by the state of our hospitals, the SNP's talk of recovery plans and action plans is simply that - talk, and dangerous talk at that. We must not allow incompetent politicians to lull us into complicity in the demise of that great British institution, the National Health Service.
Translation: Julgando pelo estado dos nossos hospitais, a conversa do SNP sobre planos de recuperação e planos de ação é simplesmente isso - falar, e falar perigoso sobre isso.Não devemos permitir que políticos incompetentes nos enganem em complicidade na demissão daquela grande instituição britânica, o Serviço Nacional de Saúde.
Reference Sentence: A julgar pelo estado dos nossos hospitais, o discurso do SNP sobre planos de recuperação e planos de ação não passa disso: é apenas um discurso demagógico. Não podemos permitir que políticos incompetentes nos embalem na cumplicidade da destruição dessa grande instituição britânica que é o NHS.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Não é isso engraçado? Temos metade do poder humano para trás, e não podemos nem sequer evitar ferir uns aos outros. Eu aprendi rapidamente, Al estava ao redor da esquina, então eu ficaria bem dentro. Um olhar atrás de mim assegurou que eu não estava mais sendo coelado enquanto eu estava em frente a um sinal brilhante que lê, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” Com passos mais lentos, eu entrei novamente – este lugar estava mais sob a cobertura, como Alborn muitas vezes levaria em pessoas que haviam sido mutadas e apanhadas em Paltricus. Ao abrir a porta, as luzes haviam sido apagadas, interessante o suficiente – não havia Al. Não havia refugiados. Nada. Algo estava certo aqui.
Reference Sentence: Não é engraçado? Estamos reduzidos a metade da força humana e não conseguimos evitar magoar-nos uns aos outros. Acelero o passo. A loja do Al era mesmo ao virar da esquina e seria um bom lugar para me abrigar. Olho de relance para trás, para assegurar que não estava a ser seguida, e dou por mim em frente a um sinal que diz "Loja de Penhores do Alborn!" Mais lentamente, entro e encontro um local menos vistoso, pois Alborn costumava dar abrigo a pessoas que tinham sofrido mutações e que se tinham refugiado em Paltricus. Depois de abrir a porta, as luzes estavam apagadas e não vi o Al. Nem refugiados. Nada. Algo de muito estranho se passava.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I could have, I guess, that makes sense. But I didn't have rental on my auto insurance, so that's my fault. So I guess I could have tried to do that and get that set up and tried to get a rental while I was down and out of a car. But even then, a rental wouldn't cover seven days. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Então meu pai não pode me dar viagens para trabalhar. E para mim, o trabalho está a cerca de 27 milhas de distância. Então lá e para trás seria quase um $ 100 por dia com a Uber. Eu não olhei para o Lyft. Eu poderia ter, eu acho, isso faz sentido. Mas eu não tinha aluguer em meu seguro de carro, então é minha culpa. Então eu acho que eu poderia ter tentado fazer isso e ter que estabelecer e tentar obter um aluguer enquanto eu estava abaixo e fora de um carro. Mas mesmo então, um aluguer não cobriria sete dias. Eu vou sneeze, mantê-lo.
Reference Sentence: Então, o meu pai não me pode dar boleia para o trabalho e, no meu caso, o trabalho fica a 40 quilómetros de distância. As viagens de ida e volta num Uber iam custar à volta de 90 euros por dia. Ainda não vi os preços na Lyft. Se calhar devia ter feito isso, na verdade. Mas o meu seguro automóvel não incluía aluguer, por isso a culpa foi minha. Acho que podia ter tentado fazer isso, tratar disso e tentar alugar um carro enquanto estivesse sem o meu. Mas mesmo assim, isso não ia dar para um aluguer de sete dias. Espera, vou espirrar. Que espirro horrível.

Source Sentence: Rosendale, a member of the hard-right Freedom Caucus, was one of the individuals who derailed the Wednesday votes. He views the top line number in Johnson's deal as being too high and as doing too little to cut the $34 trillion national debt.
Translation: Rosendale, um membro do Cáucus da Liberdade de extrema direita, foi um dos indivíduos que derrubaram os votos da quarta-feira. Ele vê o número de linha superior no acordo de Johnson como ser demasiado alto e como fazer muito pouco para cortar a dívida nacional de $34 bilhões.
Reference Sentence: Rosendale, membro do partido de extrema-direita Freedom Caucus, foi uma das pessoas que fez descarrilar a votação de quarta-feira. Considera que os valores gerais da proposta de Johnson são demasiado elevados e que não contribuem suficientemente para reduzir a dívida nacional de 34 biliões de dólares.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: South Wales quatro peças The Now estão orgulhosos de lançar seu álbum de estreia, Too Hot To Handle, através da True Music, e Callum se junta a mim agora. Como você está fazendo, Callum? Como vai? Sim, tudo bem. Bom, você mesmo? Sim, estou muito bom. Obrigado. É um privilégio falar com você mesmo porque estou ouvindo sua música bastante desde 2023. Então eu só amo a música, e acho que é algo que definitivamente precisamos nos gráficos nos dias de hoje.
Reference Sentence: The Now, o quarteto de Gales do Sul, tem o orgulho de apresentar o seu primeiro trabalho, Too Hot To Handle, sob a alçada da True Music. Callum encontra-se connosco neste momento. Como está, Callum? Como vão as coisas? Está tudo bem e consigo? Também estou bem, obrigado. É um privilégio falar convosco porque tenho ouvido bastante a vossa música desde 2023. Estou a adorar a música, e acho que vamos ver o vosso nome nos tops muito em breve.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Translation: Os resultados estão em e, bobina, por favor, é totalmente consistente com a minha história familiar. 89.9% britânico e irlandês com a maior parte daquilo concentrado nas fronteiras escocesas, Irlanda Ocidental, Gales e mural de corn. Não mostra muito breton tho, então eles são tão próximos de cornish eles não parecem tão diferentes em mim ou minha família breton não estava originalmente lá.
Reference Sentence: Os resultados chegaram e... são consistentes com o meu historial familiar. 89,9% britânico e irlandês, com a maior parte concentrada nas regiões de Scottish Borders, Irlanda ocidental, País de Gales e Cornualha. Mas não aparece nada da Bretanha, por isso, ou é tão perto da Cornualha que não há diferença, ou a minha família da Bretanha não era originalmente de lá.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.
Translation: Cu toate acestea, Tenuk și Kayel au realizat repede că nu sunt singuri. O a doua creatură întunecată a fost împușcată din sub ele, iar Tenuk a reușit doar să evite o coliziune.
Reference Sentence: Cu toate acestea, Tenuk și Kayel și-au dat repede seama că nu erau singuri. O a doua creatură întunecată a țâșnit de sub ei, iar Tenuk abia a reușit să evite coliziunea.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk a ezitat, apoi s-a întors înapoi, oferind-și ceva spațiu. Cu o grămadă scăzută, ușor dureroasă, corpul lui Tenuk s-a întins, pielea lui a fost înlocuită cu scale și brațele sale au fost înlocuite cu aripi. El s-a transformat rapid într-un Thraki normal, luminoasă albastră, dar ochii lui au rămas roșii.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk a ezitat, apoi a făcut un pas înapoi să-și ia niște spațiu. Cu un grohăit grav, ușor dureros, corpul lui Tenuk s-a întins, blana a fost înlocuită cu solzi, iar brațele cu aripi. S-a transformat rapid într-un Thraki normal, albastru deschis, dar ochii i-au rămas roșii.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.
Translation: Ei s-au întrebat dacă le-ar lăsa să intre, spre deosebire de orele anterioare au mers să întrebe. Am încă o brâu de la ultima dată. Ivory s-a scufundat din memorie. Kari a aruncat o carte pe umăr, dar când a văzut cine era, s-a scuzat imediat.
Reference Sentence: Se întreba dacă va deschide de data asta, nu ca dățile trecute când îi mai ceruse. Încă mai am o vânătaie de data trecută, chicotea Ivory amintindu-și. Kari îi aruncase cu o carte în umăr, dar când a văzut cine era, și-a cerut imediat scuze.

Source Sentence: The ESP didn't go online immediately, let's give it a few minutes.
Translation: ESP nu a mers online imediat, să-l dau câteva minute.
Reference Sentence: ESP nu s-a activat imediat, haide să-l mai lăsăm câteva minute.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretar general al Comitetului European de Întreprinderi Vinuri, reprezentând aproximativ 7.000 de producători de vin din întreaga Europă, este dismisibil de preocupările producătorilor de bere. El a spus Euronews că o piață dominată de conglomerate de bere multinaționale nu are nici o comparație cu o piață compusă aproape în întregime de producători naționali.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretarul general al asociației comerciale Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, care reprezintă circa 7.000 de producători de vin din întreaga Europă, nu consideră justificate îngrijorările berarilor. Acesta a declarat pentru Euronews că o piață dominată de conglomerate multinaționale producătoare de bere nu se compară deloc cu una compusă aproape în întregime din mici producători interni.

Source Sentence: Judging by the state of our hospitals, the SNP's talk of recovery plans and action plans is simply that - talk, and dangerous talk at that. We must not allow incompetent politicians to lull us into complicity in the demise of that great British institution, the National Health Service.
Translation: Judecând de starea spitalelor noastre, discursul SNP despre planurile de recuperare și planurile de acțiune este pur și simplu asta - vorbesc, și vorbesc periculos despre asta. Nu trebuie să permitem politicieni incompetenți să ne trimită în complicitate în demisia acestei mari instituții britanice, Serviciul Național de Sănătate.
Reference Sentence: Analizând situația spitalelor noastre, discuția SNP despre planurile de redresare și planurile de măsuri este pur și simplu o discuție; și, în plus, o discuție periculoasă. Nu trebuie să le permitem politicienilor incompetenți să ne păcălească să devenim complicii lor în pragul prăbușirii celei mai mari instituții britanice, National Health Service.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Nu este atât de amuzant? Avem jumătate din puterea omului în urmă, și nici măcar nu putem abține de a se răni unul pe altul. Am urcat rapid, Al era în jurul colțului, așa că am fost bine în interior. O privirea din spatele meu a asigurat că nu mai am fost tăiat în fața unui semn strălucitor care citește: „Alborn’s Pawnshop!” Cu pași mai lent, am intrat din nou – acest loc era mai sub acoperire, deoarece Alborn ar lua adesea în oameni care au fost mutați și s-au scufundat în Paltricus. La deschiderea ușii, luminile au fost închise, destul de interesant – nu existau Al. Nu există refugiați. Nimic. Ceva nu era corect aici.
Reference Sentence: Nu că este amuzant? Mai avem jumătate din populație și nu ne putem abține de la a ne face rău unii celorlalți. Grăbesc pasul, magazinul lui Al era chiar după colț, deci ar trebui să fie în regulă înăuntru. Când mă aflam în fața semnului strălucitor pe care scria „Amanetul lui Alborn”, am aruncat o privire în spatele meu pentru a mă asigura că nu mai sunt urmărită. Cu pași mai lenți, intru încă o dată; acest loc era mai mult o fațadă, căci Alborn lua deseori oameni care suferiseră mutații și îi strecura în Paltricus. Când deschid ușa, luminile erau stinse și, interesant, nu era niciun Al. Nici refugiați. Nimic. Ceva era în neregulă aici.

Source Sentence: These good quality stickers are about 50p each. They'll cost the same again to post. And way more in my own time to individually package and send them.

Reference Sentence: Aceste abțibilduri de bună calitate costă cam 50p fiecare. Costă tot cam atât să le expediez. Și mult mai mult din timpul meu să le ambalez și să le trimit individual.

Source Sentence: So the challenges in this are already showing themselves. I'm likely going to have a VERY difficult time getting a medical clearance due to the FAA's stance on certain medications.

Reference Sentence: Așa că provocările legate de asta deja se arată. Voi avea probabil o perioadă FOARTE grea pentru a-mi lua adeverința medicală din cauza poziției FAA cu privire la anumite medicamente.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I could have, I guess, that makes sense. But I didn't have rental on my auto insurance, so that's my fault. So I guess I could have tried to do that and get that set up and tried to get a rental while I was down and out of a car. But even then, a rental wouldn't cover seven days. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Deci, tatăl meu nu mă poate da călători la muncă. Și pentru mine, munca este de aproximativ 27 de mile distanță. Deci acolo și înapoi ar fi aproape 100 de dolari pe zi cu Uber. Nu am uitat la Lyft. Pot avea, cred, că are sens. Dar nu am avut închiriere pe asigurarea mea de mașină, așa că este vina mea. Deci cred că am putut încerca să fac acest lucru și să obțin acest set și a încercat să obțină o închiriere în timp ce eram în jos și din o mașină. Dar chiar și atunci, o închiriere nu ar acoperi șapte zile. Mă duc să zăpez, țineți mai departe.
Reference Sentence: Tatăl meu nu mă poate duce cu mașina la serviciu. Iar pentru mine, serviciul e cam la 27 de mile distanță. Dus-întors ar însemna aproape 100 USD pe zi cu Uber. Nu m-am interesat de Lyft. Cred că aș fi putut-o face, are sens. Dar asigurarea mea auto nu avea acoperire pentru închirieri, aceasta e vina mea. Cred că aș fi putut încerca să o fac și să rezolv asta, să încerc să închiriez o mașină cât timp sunt în impas și fără mașină. Dar chir și așa, închirierea nu ar dura șapte zile. O să strănut, stați. Ce strănut neplăcut!

Source Sentence: Rosendale, a member of the hard-right Freedom Caucus, was one of the individuals who derailed the Wednesday votes. He views the top line number in Johnson's deal as being too high and as doing too little to cut the $34 trillion national debt.
Translation: Rosendale, un membru al Freedom Caucus-ului de dreapta, a fost unul dintre persoanele care au dezavantajat voturile de miercuri. El vede numărul de linie de top în afacerea lui Johnson ca fiind prea mare și ca făcând prea puțin pentru a reduce datoria națională de 34 de trilioane de dolari.
Reference Sentence: Rosendale, membru al comitetului Freedom, de extremă dreaptă, a fost una dintre persoanele care au boicotat voturile de miercuri. El consideră că cifra principală din acordul lui Johnson este prea mare și că se face prea puțin pentru a reduce datoria națională de 34 de trilioane de dolari.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: South Wales patru piese The Now sunt mândri să-și lanseze albumul de debut, Too Hot To Handle, prin True Music, și Callum se alătură acum. Cum faci, Callum? Cum se întâmplă? Da, totul bine. Bun, tine? Da, sunt foarte bun. Mulțumesc. Este un privilegiu să vorbesc cu tine, pentru că am ascultat muzica ta destul de mult din 2023. Deci, iubesc muzica și cred că este ceva de care avem cu siguranță nevoie în diagrame în zilele noastre.
Reference Sentence: Trupa compusă din patru membri din Țara Galilor de Sud, The Now, e mândră să-și lanseze albumul de debut, Too Hot To Handle, prin True Music, iar Callum mi se alătură acum. Ce mai faci, Callum? Cum merge treaba? E totul bine. Tu ce mai faci? Sunt foarte bine, mulțumesc. E un privilegiu să stau de vorbă cu voi, pentru că vă ascult mult muzica începând din 2023. Îmi place foarte mult și cred că este exact ceea ce avem nevoie în topuri în aceste zile.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Translation: Rezultatele sunt în și, drum roll, vă rugăm, este complet consistent cu istoria mea de familie. 89.9% britanici și irlandezi cu cea mai mare parte concentrate în granițele scoțiene, Irlanda de Vest, Țara Galilor și murul de corn. Nu arată o mulțime de breton tho astfel încât fie sunt atât de aproape de cornish ei nu arată ca diferit în mine sau familia mea breton nu a fost inițial de acolo.
Reference Sentence: Rezultatele au sosit și, pregătiți-vă, sunt perfect compatibile cu istoricul meu familial. 89,9 % britanic și irlandez, majoritatea fiind concentrată la granițele scoțiene, Irlanda de Vest, Țara Galilor și Cornwall. Nu indică mari influențe bretone, dar fie sunt atât de apropiate de cele din Cornwall și nu se diferențiază, fie familia mea bretonă nu este de origine de acolo.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.
Translation: Tenuk a Kayel si však rýchlo uvedomili, že nie sú sami. Druhá temná tvorka zastrelená z nich a Tenuk sa jednoducho podarilo vyhnúť sa koliziu.
Reference Sentence: No obidvaja si rýchlo uvedomili, že nie sú sami. Zospodu k nim vyrazilo druhé tmavé monštrum a Tenuk sa len tak-tak vyhol zrážke.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk váhal, potom sa vrátil späť a dal si nejaký priestor. S nízkym, mierne boleným gruntom sa Tenukovo telo roztiahlo, jeho pokožka bola nahradená skalami a jeho ruky boli nahradené krídlami. Rýchlo sa obrátil na normálny, svetlo modré Thraki, ale jeho oči zostali červené.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk zaváhal, potom urobil krok vzad, aby mal viac miesta. S hlbokým, mierne bolestným zavrčaním sa jeho telo natiahlo, srsť sa zmenila na šupiny a namiesto rúk mu narástli krídla. Rýchlo sa premenil na normálneho bledomodrého Thrakiho, iba jeho oči ostali červené.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.
Translation: Pýtali sa, či ich skutočne nechá vstúpiť, na rozdiel od predchádzajúcich časov, keď sa pýtali. Mám stále brúsenku z poslednej chvíle. Slonovina vytrhla z pamäti. Kari hodil knihu na svoje ramená, ale keď videla, kto to bolo, okamžite sa ospravedlnila.
Reference Sentence: Bol zvedavý, či ho už na rozdiel od predchádzajúcich návštev pustí dnu. Modrina z posledného pokusu sa mu stále nezahojila. Ivory sa pri tej spomienke uchechtol. Kari mu hodila do ramena knihu, ale keď zistila, o koho ide, hneď sa ospravedlnila.

Source Sentence: The ESP didn't go online immediately, let's give it a few minutes.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, generálny tajomník Výboru Européen des Entreprises Vins, ktorý zastupuje približne 7 000 výrobcov vína v celej Európe, je odmietnutý obavy výrobcov piva. Euronews povedal, že trh dominovaný nadnárodnými pivovarskými konglomerátmi nemožno porovnávať s tým, ktorý sa skladá takmer výhradne z malých domácich výrobcov.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, generálny tajomník obchodnej asociácie Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, ktorá zastupuje približne 7 000 výrobcov vína z celej Európy, sa k výhradám pivovarníkov stavia odmietavo. Ako povedal pre Euronews, trh ovládaný nadnárodnými pivovarníckymi konglomerátmi sa nedá porovnať s trhom, ktorý sa skladá takmer bez výnimky z drobných domácich výrobcov.

We must not allow incompetent politicians to lull us into complicity in the demise of that great British institution, the National Health Service.
Translation: Súdiaci podľa stavu našich nemocníc, rozhovor SNP o plánoch zotavenia a akčných plánoch je jednoducho to - hovoriť, a nebezpečné hovoriť o tom. Nesmieme dovoliť, aby nás nekompetentní politici vkladajú do spriaznenia v zrútení tejto veľkej britskej inštitúcie, Národnej zdravotnej služby.
Reference Sentence: Súdiac podľa situácie v našich nemocniciach sú reči Škótskej národnej strany o plánoch obnovy a akčných plánoch naozaj len rečami, a to nebezpečnými. Nesmieme nekompetentným politikom dovoliť, aby z nás spravili spolupáchateľov zániku tejto veľkej britskej inštitúcie, Národnej zdravotnej služby.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Nie je to vtipné? Máme polovicu ľudskej sily, a nemôžeme sa ani zdržať ublížiť navzájom. Rýchlo som sa nahýbal, Al bol okolo rohu, takže by som bol pekný vo vnútri. Pohľad za mnou zabezpečil, že som už nebol obalený, keď som stál pred jasným svietiacim znakom, ktorý čítal: „Alborn's Pawnshop!“ S pomalšími krokmi som vstúpil znovu – toto miesto bolo viac pod krytom, pretože Alborn by často vziať ľudí, ktorí boli mutovaní a klesli do Paltricus. Po otvorení dverí, svetlá boli vypnuté, zaujímavé dosť – nebolo žiadne Al. Žiadne utečencov. Nič. Niečo tu bolo správne.
Reference Sentence: Smiešne, nie? Neostala nám ani polovica sily, no aj tak sme sa nevedeli ovládnuť natoľko, aby sme jeden druhému neubližovali. Náhlivo som zrýchlila. Alov podnik je za rohom, vnútri budem v bezpečí. Keď som dorazila pred jasne žiariaci pútač s nápisom „Albornova záložňa!“, pohľadom ponad plece som sa ubezpečila, že ma nikto nesleduje. Pomalým krokom som vošla už do druhého podniku – toto miesto bolo tak trochu v podzemí, pretože Alborn sem často vodil mutantov, ktorým sa podarilo prešmyknúť do Paltricusu. Otvorila som dvere, lenže dnu sa nesvietilo. Zaujímavé. Po Alovi takisto ani stopa. Žiadni utečenci. Nič. Niečo tu nehralo.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I could have, I guess, that makes sense. But I didn't have rental on my auto insurance, so that's my fault. So I guess I could have tried to do that and get that set up and tried to get a rental while I was down and out of a car. But even then, a rental wouldn't cover seven days. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Takže môj otec mi nemôže dať jazdiť na prácu. A pre mňa, práca je asi 27 míľ. Takže tam a späť by bolo takmer 100 dolárov denne s Uberom. Nevšimol som sa na Lyft. Mohol som mať, myslím, že má zmysel. Ale nemal som prenájom na môj auto poistenie, takže to je moja vina. Takže myslím, že som sa mohol pokúsiť to urobiť a dostať to a pokúsiť sa dostať prenájom, zatiaľ čo som bol dole a z auta. Ale aj potom by prenájom nezahŕňal sedem dní. Chcem sa sneeze, držať ďalej.
Reference Sentence: Takže otec ma nemôže voziť do práce. Od nás z domu je to 40 kilometrov. Keby som využívala službu Uber, tam a späť by ma to vyšlo zhruba 100 USD na deň. Ešte som nepozerala Lyft. Myslím, že by som mohla, to dáva zmysel. Do poistky na auto som si však nedala prenájom, moja chyba. Čiže myslím, že by som to mohla skúsiť, zriadiť si možnosť prenájmu a prenajímať auto v čase, keď ho nepoužívam. Ani v takom prípade mi však prenájom nepokryje sedem dní. Moment, musím si kýchnuť. Neznášam kýchanie.

Translation: Sobotný účet:
Reference Sentence: Sobota, pokračovanie:

Source Sentence: Rosendale, a member of the hard-right Freedom Caucus, was one of the individuals who derailed the Wednesday votes. He views the top line number in Johnson's deal as being too high and as doing too little to cut the $34 trillion national debt.
Translation: Rosendale, člen tvrdo pravicového Freedom Caucus, bol jedným z jedincov, ktorí odmietli stredu hlasovanie. Vnímajú, že vrchol číslice v Johnsonovej dohody je príliš vysoký a robí príliš málo na zníženie štátneho dlhu 34 biliónov dolárov.
Reference Sentence: Člen ultrapravicovej frakcie Freedom Caucus Rosendale bol jedným z tých, ktorí blokovali stredajšie hlasovanie. Podľa jeho názoru je číslo v hornom riadku Johnsonovej dohody príliš vysoké, pričom nedostatočne rieši znižovanie štátneho dlhu vo výške 34 biliónov USD.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: South Wales štyri diely The Now sú hrdí na to, že vydali svoj debutový album, Too Hot To Handle, cez True Music, a Callum sa ku mne teraz pripojí. Ako to robíte, Callum? Ako to bude? Áno, všetko dobré. Dobrý, sám? Áno, som veľmi dobrý. Ďakujem. Je to privilegia hovoriť so sebou, pretože som počúval vašu hudbu dosť od roku 2023. Takže len milujem hudbu, a myslím, že je to niečo, čo určite potrebujeme v týchto dňoch v grafoch.
Reference Sentence: Štvorica muzikantov z Južného Walesu, ktorí si hovoria The Now, uvádzajú na trh prostredníctvom platformy True Music svoj debutový album s názvom Too Hot To Handle, a práve si ku mne sadá Callum. Ako sa máš, Callum? Čo máš nové? OK, všetko v poriadku. Super, a ty ako? Veľmi dobre. Ďakujem. Je to pre mňa veľká česť, že sa s tebou môžem rozprávať, pretože od roku 2023 počúvam tvoju hudbu celkom intenzívne a môžem povedať, že ju jednoducho milujem a v súčasnosti jej určite patrí miesto v hitparádach.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Translation: Výsledky sú v a, bobule, prosím, je to úplne v súlade s mojou rodinnou históriou. 89.9% Britov a írskych s väčšinou sústredené na škótskych hraniciach, západného Írska, Walesu a kukurice. To neukazuje veľa breton tho, takže buď sú tak blízko k kukurice sa nevykazujú ako odlišné v mne alebo moja bretonská rodina nebola pôvodne odtiaľ.
Reference Sentence: Už máme výsledky a, poprosím o zabubnovanie, sú úplne v súlade s históriou mojej rodiny. Na 89,9 % Brit a Ír, pričom väčšina z toho je sústredená na škótskych hraniciach, v západnom Írsku, Walese a Cornwalle. Neukazuje to však veľa z Bretóncov, takže buď sú takí blízki Cornwallčanom, že to u mňa neukazuje rozdiely, alebo moja bretónska rodina z tejto oblasti pôvodne nepochádzala.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.
Translation: Men Tenuk och Kayel insåg snabbt att de inte var ensamma. En andra mörk varelse sköt ut från under dem, och Tenuk lyckades bara undvika en kollision.
Reference Sentence: Dock insåg Tenuk och Kayel snabbt att de inte var ensamma. En andra mörk varelse dök upp underifrån och Tenuk lyckades precis undvika en kollision.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk tvekar, steg sedan tillbaka och gav sig lite utrymme. Med en låg, något smärtsam grunt sträckte Tenuk's kropp ut, hans hår ersattes med skala och hans armar ersattes med vingar. Han förvandlade sig snabbt till en normal, ljusblå Thraki, men hans ögon förblev röda.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk tvekade och tog sedan ett steg tillbaka, för att ge sig själv lite utrymme. Med ett lågt, något smärtfyllt stön, sträcktes Tenuks kropp ut, hans päls ersattes med fjäll och hans armar ersattes med vingar. Han förvandlade sig snabbt till en normal ljusblå Thraki, men hans ögon förblev röda.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.
Translation: De undrade om hon verkligen skulle låta dem komma in, till skillnad från de tidigare gånger de gick att fråga. Jag har fortfarande en bröst från sista gången. Ivory knullade från minnet. Kari hade kastat en bok på axeln, men när hon såg vem det var, be om ursäkt hon omedelbart.
Reference Sentence: De undrade om hon verkligen skulle släppa in dem, till skillnad från de tidigare gångerna när de kom för att fråga. Jag har fortfarande ett blåmärke från förra gången. Ivory skrockade åt minnet. Kari hade kastat en bok på deras axel, men när hon såg vem det var, bad hon om ursäkt omedelbart.

Source Sentence: The ESP didn't go online immediately, let's give it a few minutes.
Translation: ESP gick inte online direkt, låt oss ge det några minuter.
Reference Sentence: ESP anslöt inte direkt, vi väntar ett par minuter.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, generalsekreterare för Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, som representerar cirka 7 000 vinproducenter över hela Europa, är avskräckt från bryggeriens oro. Han berättade för Euronews att en marknad som domineras av multinationella bryggeri inte är jämfört med en marknad som består nästan helt av små inhemska producenter.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte avfärdar öltillverkarnas oro. Han är generalsekreterare för branschorganisationen Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins som representerar 7 000 vintillverkare i Europa. Vidare förklarade han för Euronews att en marknad som domineras av multinationella bryggerikonglomerat inte kan jämföras med en som nästan enbart består av små inhemska producenter.

Source Sentence: Judging by the state of our hospitals, the SNP's talk of recovery plans and action plans is simply that - talk, and dangerous talk at that. We must not allow incompetent politicians to lull us into complicity in the demise of that great British institution, the National Health Service.
Translation: Att döma av tillståndet i våra sjukhus är SNP:s tal om återhämtningsplaner och handlingsplaner helt enkelt det - prata, och farligt tala om det. Vi får inte tillåta inkompetenta politiker att lura oss i samverkan i den stora brittiska institutionen, National Health Service.
Reference Sentence: Av att döma av tillståndet på våra sjukhus är SNP.s prat om återhämtnings- och handlingsplaner bara just det – prat, och det är farligt prat. Vi får inte låta inkompetenta politiker vagga oss in i medverkan till bortfallet av denna fantastiska brittiska institution, National Health Service.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Är det inte så roligt? Vi har hälften av mänskligheten kvar, och vi kan inte ens avstå från att skada varandra. Jag skyndade mig upp, Al var runt hörnet, så jag skulle vara fin inuti. En blick bakom mig säkerställde att jag inte längre var klippt när jag stod framför ett ljus lysande tecken som läste, "Alborns Pawnshop!" Med långsamare steg gick jag in igen – den här platsen var mer under täcken, eftersom Alborn skulle ofta ta i människor som hade blivit muterade och snubblade in i Paltricus. När dörren öppnade, hade ljusen stängts av, intressanta nog – det fanns ingen Al. Inga flyktingar. Inget. Något var inte rätt här.
Reference Sentence: Är det inte lustigt? Hälften av mänskligheten finns kvar, och vi kan inte ens sluta att göra varandra illa. Jag ökade farten, Als ställe var precis runt hörnet, så jag skulle vara säker därinne. En snabb blick bakåt försäkrade mig om att jag inte var förföljd längre när jag stod framför en starkt upplyst skylt med texten "Alborns pantbank!". Med långsammare steg gick jag in åter en gång - detta stället hölls ganska hemligt, eftersom Alborn ofta släppte in människor som hade muterats och smitit in i Paltricus. När jag öppnade dörren var lamporna släckta och intressant nog - ingen Al. Inga flyktingar. Ingenting. Det var något som inte stämde här.

Source Sentence: These good quality stickers are about 50p each. They'll cost the same again to post. And way more in my own time to individually package and send them.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I could have, I guess, that makes sense. But I didn't have rental on my auto insurance, so that's my fault. So I guess I could have tried to do that and get that set up and tried to get a rental while I was down and out of a car. But even then, a rental wouldn't cover seven days. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Så min pappa kan inte ge mig resor till jobbet. Och för mig är arbetet cirka 27 miles bort. Så där och tillbaka skulle det vara nästan $ 100 per dag med Uber. Jag har inte tittat på Lyft. Jag kunde ha, antar jag, det är meningslöst. Men jag hade inte hyra på min bilförsäkring, så det är mitt fel. Så jag antar att jag kunde ha försökt göra det och få den inställd och försökte få en hyra medan jag var ner och ur en bil. Men även då skulle en hyra inte täcka sju dagar. Jag kommer att snäva, håll på. Den snäva sugen.
Reference Sentence: Så min pappa kan inte skjutsa mig till jobbet. Och för mig är det omkring 27 miles till jobbet. Så fram och tillbaka skulle innebära nästan $100 per dag med Uber. Jag har inte tittat på Lyft. Det kunde jag ha gjort, antar jag, det vore vettigt. Men hyrbil ingick inte i min bilförsäkring, så det är mitt fel. Så jag antar att jag kunde ha försökt att göra det och få det arrangerat och försökt att få tag på en hyrbil medan jag var utan bil. Men även om jag gjorde det skulle en hyrbil inte täcka sju dagar. Jag måste nysa, ett ögonblick. Det där var världens sämsta nysning.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.

Det visar inte mycket breton tho så antingen de är så nära cornish de inte ser så annorlunda i mig eller min breton familj var ursprungligen från där.
Reference Sentence: Här kommer resultaten och, en trumvirvel om jag får be, det är helt överensstämmande med min familjs histora. 89,9 % brittisk och irländsk till mestadels koncentrerat kring de skotska gränserna, västra Irland, Wales och Cornwall. Det visar dock inte hur mycket breton, så antingen är de så nära det korniska folket att de inte visar sig som olika i mig eller så var min bretonska familj ursprungligen inte därifrån.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.
Translation: Ancak, Tenuk ve Kayel hızla yalnız olmadıklarını fark ettiler. İkinci karanlık yaratık altından vuruldu ve Tenuk sadece bir çarpışma önlemek için başardı.
Reference Sentence: Ancak Tenuk ve Kayel yalnız olmadıklarını fark ettiler. İkinci bir koyu renkli yaratık birden aşağıdan fırladı. Tenuk çarpışmadan kaçınmayı son anda başarabildi.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk tereddüt etti, sonra geri adım atarak kendine biraz yer verdi. Düşük, hafifçe ağrılı bir toprakla, Tenuk'un vücudu uzattı, saçları ölçeklerle değiştirildi ve kolları kanatlarla değiştirildi. hızla normal, hafif mavi Thraki haline geldi, ancak gözleri kırmızı kaldı.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk tereddüt etti, sonra geri çekilerek kendine biraz yer açtı. Alçak tondan, biraz acı içinde bir homurdanma ile Tenuk'un gövdesi esnedi. Kürkünün yerini pullar, kollarının yerini kanatlar aldı. Hızlıca normal, açık mavi Thraki'ye döndü, ama gözleri kırmızı kaldı.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.
Translation: Daha önce sormak istedikleri zamanların aksine, gerçekten içeri girmesine izin vereceklerini merak ettiler. Ben hala son zamandan beri bir çamur var. Ivory hafızadan çöktü. Kari omuzlarında bir kitap atmıştı, ama kim olduğunu gördüğünde hemen özür diledi.
Reference Sentence: Acaba içeriye girmesine izin verecek miydi? Geçen sefer olanları düşünecek olursak... "Geçen seferden kalan morluk duruyor", diye kıkırdadı Ivory olanları hatırlayarak. Kari omzuna bir kitap atmıştı, ama kim olduğunu görünce hemen özür dilemişti.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Avrupa'da yaklaşık 7.000 şarap üreticisini temsil eden Komitesi'nin Genel Sekreteri Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, bira üreticilerinin endişelerinden vazgeçilmez. Euronews'e, çok uluslu bira konglomeratları tarafından yönetilen bir pazarın neredeyse tamamen küçük, yerli üreticilerden oluşan bir pazarla karşılaştırılmadığını söyledi.
Reference Sentence: Tüm Avrupa'da yaklaşık 7.000 şarap üreticisini temsil eden Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins ticaret birliğinin genel sekreteri Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, bira üreticilerinin endişeleri karşısında kayıtsız kalıyor. Euronews’a yaptığı açıklamada çok uluslu bira üretim holdinglerince domine edilen bir pazar ile neredeyse tamamı küçük ve yerli üreticilerden oluşan bir pazarın kıyaslanamayacağını dile getirdi.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Bu komik değil mi? İnsan gücünün yarısı var ve birbirimize zarar vermekten bile kaçınamayız. Hızlıca yükseldi, Al's köşenin etrafındaydı, bu yüzden içeride iyi olacaktı. Arkamda bir bakış, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” Okuduğum parlak parlak bir işaret karşısında durduğumdan emin oldu, daha yavaş adımlarla, tekrar girdim-bu yerin kapak altındaydı, çünkü Alborn genellikle çökmüş ve Paltricus’a sarmıştı. Kapıyı açtığında, ışıklar kapandı, ilginç yeterince ilginç bir şekilde – Hiçbir Al. Hiçbir mülteci vardı. Hiçbir şey. Burada bir şey doğru değildi.
Reference Sentence: Komik değil mi? İnsan gücümüzün yarısını kaybettik ama hala birbirimizi incitmekten geri duramıyoruz. Aceleyle hızlandım, Al'in dükkanı köşeyi dönünce karşıma çıkacaktı, içeri girince güvende olurdum. Arkama bir bakış attım, "Alborn'un Rehinci Dükkanı!" yazan parlak, parlayan bir tabelanın önünde dururken artık takip edilmediğimden emin oldum. Daha yavaş adımlarla içeri girdim - burası daha tenhaydı, çünkü Alborn genellikle mutasyona uğramış ve Paltricus'a gizlice girmiş insanları içeri alırdı. Kapıyı açtığımda, ilginç bir şekilde ışıklar kapatılmıştı. Al yoktu. Mülteciler yoktu. Hiçbir şey yoktu. Burada ters giden birşeyler vardı.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I could have, I guess, that makes sense. But I didn't have rental on my auto insurance, so that's my fault. So I guess I could have tried to do that and get that set up and tried to get a rental while I was down and out of a car. But even then, a rental wouldn't cover seven days. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Bu yüzden babam bana çalışmak için sürüşler veremez. Ve benim için, iş yaklaşık 27 mil uzaklıktadır. Bu yüzden Uber ile günde neredeyse 100 $ olacaktı. Lyft'a baktım. Ben, sanırım, bu mantıklı olabilir. Ama araba sigortası üzerinde kiralama yoktu, bu yüzden benim suçum. Bu yüzden bunu yapmaya çalıştım ve bir araba altında ve dışarı çıktığımda bir kiralık elde etmeye çalıştım sanırım. Ama o zaman bile, bir kiralık yedi günyi kaplamayacak.
Reference Sentence: Babam beni işe bırakamıyor. İşim yaklaşık 43 kilometre uzaklıkta. Yani Uber'le gidip gelmek günde 100 dolara yakın tutuyor. Lyft'e bakmadım. Bakabilirdim aslında, mantıklı olurdu. Ama araba sigortamda kiralık araç seçeneği yoktu, bu benim hatam. Sanırım bunu ayarlayıp arabasız kaldığım süre boyunca kiralık bir araba kullanabilirdim. Ama yine de, kiralık araba yedi gün yetmezdi. Hapşıracağım, bekleyin. Berbat bir hapşırıktı.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: South Wales dört parçalı The Now, True Music aracılığıyla ilk albümlerini yayınlamaktan gurur duyuyor, ve Callum şimdi bana katılıyor. Nasıl yapıyorsunuz, Callum? Nasıl gidiyor? Evet, her şey iyi. İyi, kendiniz? Evet, ben çok iyi. Teşekkür ederim. 2023 yılından beri müziğinizi çok dinledim çünkü kendinizle konuşmak bir ayrıcalıktır. Bu yüzden müziğinizi sadece seviyorum ve bu günlerde grafiklerde kesinlikle ihtiyacımız olan bir şey olduğunu düşünüyorum.
Reference Sentence: Güney Gallerli dört kişiden oluşan The Now grubu ilk albümleri Too Hot To Handle'ı True Music etiketiyle piyasaya sürdü ve Callum şu anda yanımda. Nasılsın, Callum? Nasıl gidiyor? Evet, gayet iyi. İyi, siz? Evet, çok iyiyim. Teşekkürler. Sizinle konuşmak bir ayrıcalık çünkü müziğinizi 2023'ten beri dinliyorum. Yani müziğinizi seviyorum ve bugünlerde listelerde ihtiyacımız olan şeyin bu olduğunu düşünüyorum.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Translation: Sonuçlar içinde ve, drum roll, lütfen, bu benim aile tarihine tamamen tutarlıdır.% 89.9 İskoç sınırları, Batı İrlanda, Galler ve süt duvarlarında yoğunlaşan İngiliz ve İrlanda. Bu çok fazla breton tho göstermiyor, bu yüzden onlar benim veya breton ailem orijinalde farklı görünmüyor gibi görünmüyorlar.
Reference Sentence: Sonuçlar geldi ve (lütfen davullar çalsın) aile geçmişimle tamamen tutarlı. %89,9 Britanya ve İrlanda kökenliyim ve bunun çoğu İskoç sınırları, Batı İrlanda, Galler ve Cornwall'da yoğunlaşıyor. Ancak pek Breton geni görünmüyor, yani ya Cornish genlerine o kadar yakınlar ki bende farklı çıkmıyorlar ya da Breton ailem aslında oradan değilmiş.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk je oklijevao, zatim se vratio, dao sebi malo prostora. S niskim, lagano bolnim gruntom, Tenukovo tijelo se proteže, njegova kosa je zamijenila skalama i ruke zamijenila krila. Brzo se pretvorio u normalan, svijetlo plavi Thraki, ali njegove oči su ostale crvene.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk je oklijevao, zatim se odmaknuo da bi dobio prostora. Tiho i pomalo bolno dašćući, Tenukovo se tijelo istegnulo, njegovo krzno zamijenile su ljuske, a ruke krila. Brzo se pretvorio u uobičajenog, svjetloplavog Thrakija, ali oči su mu ostale crvene.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.
